UPDATE: Once my friend and i brainstormed this product, we determined that mine did not work due to a faulty extension cord, and his did not work because the charging port on his phone needed cleaning. Problems solved and chargers now work acceptably well. This product works on and off intermittently. It doesn't seem to have a strong connection on the port into the phone. A friend also bought several and is having the same problem. I am going to return it. The poor connection is not related to the cell phone cover, as I did a comparison with the cover on and off.

I bought two of these. One for me and one for my hubs. They’re okay. The length is decent, next time I’ll go longer. The quality looks nice, but within just a couple months of having them, they already have a sweet & sour spot... if the cord is bent a little wrong, it won’t charge. Overall they do the job & I can’t truly complain. I do like the look of the colors.

I really liked the length and the cord I hoped would be much more durable than my old plastic coated cord.  It is the only charger I had and carried from home to work daily.  After only a couple months use, it began shorting out through the night and would actually deplete the battery rather than charge it.  It would have to be setting just right on a table or it would stop charging.  Then in that last month it quit completely and I have since ordered a replacement from a different company.  Amazon says that I may replace within the year, so I am going to try that and see if that is an accurate statement.

the fabric of the cord keeps it from splitting like a traditional rubber cord does. It still rolls up easily and has an attached velcro strap for wrapping the cord and storing. The length is good for me (I didn't opt for the 6' item) and it matches my mac
Needed a new long charger after my apple one broke after a couple years. Decided to give this one a try. Been using for a couple months now and it works great. No complaints.

I had to replace a different cord because it was failing to charge my phone. This cord charges my phone more quickly than the prior cord ever did. It seems durable and has not tried to kink over just below the plug as many cords do. I need to buy a few more as I need them at home, in the car and at work.

Warning! My cable, while connected to the outlet but NOT to the iPhone device, began to burn a hole through my carpet!  NO JOKE!!!  I am throwing all these cables out. These cords are a SERIOUS FIRE HAZARD!!!Happy to send picture to whomever.

These lightning usb cords are a step above the cheaper Amazon Basic ones and last a long time.  For ultimate durability, go with the thicker outside wrapped cord from Amazon Basics.  All of these wires are able to transfer data and charge devices with a lightning to usb connection.  Great product.

Ordered this for my night stand. Nice quality and charges just like the apple brand. Love the pink color and the fact it’s braided makes it less likely to break. In my head 6ft was going to be a lot longer but it definitely works so I can roll over in bed and still use it!

Purchased October 2018, and finally coming to replace it... not because it’s broken, but because I bought it in pink and it’s dirty looking in some places. I donated it, it still works totally fine. Which was very surprising. Connectors never split, cord held amazingly well. Great length with the 6’ and I’m going to buy another right now!

Love this charger, love the color, love the length. I like that it comes with a little Velcro piece to wrap it up.because it is braided it kinks sometimes but other than that it is great. I don't trust other chargers, you read many things like many are not really apple certified. This is a great alternative to apple charger since amazon can be trusted. Charges fast too but I use the plug from my iPad

I have been using this cable for about 8 months now and it has been working great for me.I like the length and the braided technology. I had a different 6 foot cable that ended up breaking on me after only a few months, so I am glad that this has lasted.
I cannot have the Amazon Basics emblem facing upwards unless I want to further drain my battery!

Bought one a while back. Endured four kids until it finally gave up the ghost. I bought a second one and discovered the first one still had some fight left in it.Point is these cables are tough. They can take a lot of abuse and keep going.

After years of going through SEVERAL chargers a year, I came across these chargers. I’ve had the same one for about 3 years. I bought the pink one, I use it all the time and it still works like it’s brand new. I bought one for my boyfriend, one for my dad, and one for my car as well. I recommend them to everyone! Never buy a charger from a drug store again. This is the only charger you need!

Pink, durable and cute! What more do you need! I have been using this charger for a while now and I absolutely love it. Very durable- I take it with me everywhere and have never had an issue. I highly recommend this charger!

Apple phone chargers start charging as soon as you plug in, without fail. This charger takes a ridiculous amount of finessing to make sure that its connected, then you have to cradle it onto a surface so you don't lose that connection. I bought 2 and they both have the same issue. Spend your money elsewhere, this is a poor product disguised with a high price tag!

Just what I needed at a great price. The cord stands up to cats who won’t stop trying to play with the charging cable, I have not found any holes or snags at all after several months. The length is perfect for using my phone while charging wherever I want to be and however I want to sit on my bed and couch.

Good quality with reinforcement where wire meets connector.  This has been the common failure point for all of my previous cords regardless of brand.Small Velcro attachment for easy coiling is nice for this longer cable.

This is a well-done product.  The cable is durable and will coil and lay flat neatly.  The molded-on strain relief at the connectors is secure and addresses one of the historical weak points of an i-device cable.  The length allows one to use the cable in a car or office desktop and not have to hunch with the device over a connection that's too short.I'm going to get another one or two the next time I place an order on Prime.
Stopped working after a couple weeks

This fits with my case still on which is an issue with some other chargers. However, it doesn’t stay in as well as another brand I’ve bought before. For instance, I can hold the cord with the phone hanging and it stays attached with my other charger. With this one, If I’m laying in bed, holding my phone,  and move slightly, the charger detached from my phone.

I did not have a problem with it. It did it’s job but after 6 months it stopped working. I guess you get what you pay for.. I also never moved it from its spot and kept it at work. I went ahead and bought another charger off Amazon that came with 5 for around the same price.

I waited to give my review on this product to give proper time to see if it held up. Within a month my charger now decides when it wants to be compatible with my iPhone. The brading on the cord has frayed as well, which is most disappointing to me, as I bought it to be more durable than the original apple charger that came with the phone. If still works, but I'll have to be buying another soon.
This overall is a good deal.  You buy 10 so you get 6 that work.If you do the math you will see that it is a good deal.

I love the look, feel, and length of this cord but it just keeps having little problems that bug me so much. I'm pretty rough on my power cords but I expect a charger to last a few months before having problems. It started showing a lot of little quirks quickly, sometimes it won't connect and you have to flip the direction a few times. Or it won't charge at a certain angle. Or other little quirks.Other times it works fine and the inconsistency bothers me too. At least break so I can get a new one. I don't get how someone in real life recommended me this saying it worked for a year.

Had them for a while now and these are great quality and all different sizes for taking different places.  Nice long one for travel and bedside and shorter ones for sticking in my scrubs for taking to work.  I would buy again for sure.

I know there can be some cheap knock offs out there, this isn't one of them. It was really nice and sturdy. I have a feeling it will last much longer than the Apple originals as those always seem to fray at the plug end. Impressed

Love having the extra length so you can charge and still comfortably use your phone but this cord only worked for about a month before the micro USB seemed to come loose and wobble. After that I would have to wiggle it a bit to get it to charge and then it stopped charging all together.You may be better off looking elsewhere.

These cords are amazing! Use this cord every day and every night. Love the longer cord and the fact that it is lightning charge. If I forget to charge it at work... even if my phone is practically dead when I get home. It will charge significantly while I change before going to the gym. I will continue to buy these cords for everything! Highly recommend

Use this cord in my car daily, and it's held up great. Perfect length for the car if you're in the front seat, just a little too short to reach the back seat if you have children (plugged into center console/arm rest area), and the braided material makes it much harder to wear out around the ports like other chargers do.

This cord was pretty but just didn't last very long.  I shouldn't complain, none of these cords last long, even the apple brand.  But since I NEVER had issues with cords not working before the lightning cable came out, I remain very displeased with every cord I use.

Perfect and comes with Velcro band to tie up cord if too long or for storage.  Would be hard to break the connector since has solid, inflexible rubber at end and cord is flexible but could never be bent at a 90 degree angle. So far so good.  Love the length, color and price! I have iPhone 7 and doesn’t throw a stink hooking up 3rd party accessory.  Would buy again.

I like how strong the braided cord is! It makes it feel much sturdier than my old charger and I think it will withstand much more abuse than my old one did. 6 feet is the perfect length for me to plus this in behind my couch too!

Very durable and long. I love this thing. Great little product. Seems silly to say about a cord, but the original cable started to come apart a long time ago. I put up with it, bending it just right to charge my device. I should have bought this immediately with my device. Longer and stronger.

Bought this when my regular Apple charger got a tear in it and stopped working, realized i needed something durable so looked up rope chargers and stumbled upon this. I already have the same brand and style in an aux cord so i trusted the quality. This is perfect length (6ft) for right next to my bed, I can comfortably move all over my bed without pulling on it. Charges pretty quickly, have had it for 2 months and still pulling great. Haven’t gotten an “accessory not supported” messages. Love the color option too. Definitely would recommend.

I have a 6' cord for my room and a 3' cord for my car. Much better than an apple cord, looks nice as well, charging time is the same as it would be with an apple cord. A lot of apple cords will bend and peel at the base where the cord meets the lightning connector, this does not, it has reinforcement. Will only purchase these from now on.
I love the color so much, it looks so pretty with my rose gold iPhone 7 Plus and the color matches so well. I also purchased the

I ordered two of these and after a few months, they both bent at the ends and were not consistent in charging. If you will never move it, you are fine but if you travel or need to take your cord with you often, I do not recommend.

I don't know how many times I have ordered cords in for my iPhone and the cord was too light to adequately charge the phone.  Not this cord!  Very heavy duty.  I do find the metal shielding a bit annoying and the cable is quite stiff.  All in all, hard to beat for the money so I gave it five stars!  Looks good in my car too.

I gave it 5 stars for length because it is the most 6 feet of 6 feet charging cable possible!  Other than that it works smoothly with my iPhone - haven't gotten any compatibility device warnings - and charges just as fast as regular Apple cables.

I love these charging cables! We have 4 of them and they all work great! We have had them for about 9 months now, no issues with them at all. The regular white nonbraided ones don’t last near as long as these. I bought one of those in the amazon basic brand, and I think it lasted 4-5 weeks before spilting at the end like most do. Well worth the couple extra dollars for this one.

I guess they really know how to get you. “Make it last just long enough until it’s past the Amazon return period. Ordered two of these for me and the wife, one magically stopped working after about a month and the other about 3 weeks after that. I just saw these dead wires in a junk drawer and it made me mad enough to write a review about it.

I overlooked the comments because of the high number of reviews and it being very affordable. My cable arrived quickly and after about a month of use it begins to give. For example, the “accessory is not supported,” alert action comes up and the charge goes in and out. A bit disappointed but also didn’t expect much. I’m looking for a reliable Lightening cable.

Purchased one for me then got them for the whole family. Even have one in my travel bag. Great long cord for reading while charging. You never know where the plug will be in hotels so this cord is long enough to reach the nightstand. Great for waiting rooms too when you need a charge and the outlet is not so close.

For the first month, this charging cord worked perfectly well. But now I am noticing it only charges my iPhone sporadically depending on the position of the cord. It may be the internal wiring wore down as time went by. Would not buy this product again.

So far, works great. Time will have to tell if this is really worth the few extra dollars over a 'standard' plastic cable but I got tired of cables, even certified ones, getting broken or just stop working so this time I invested in a more expensive, hopefully better built cable. It does feel very high quality and it's pretty long but like I said, the real test is the test of time here.

The Apple lightning charger lasts about three days after the one year warranty expires. I have owned Verizon cords that survived three years of abuse by six teens.  These are the next closest thing I’ve owned to those cords: great length options, durable and charge very well. Don’t buy garbage cords. These are great.

I bought this charging cord months and months ago and it still works. The little Velcro piece that’s on it so you can roll it up, has come off but other than that, it still looks clean and works great. I’m glad I picked this one. My daughter has one too and she got hers way before I got mine and hers still works great too.
Quit working in less than a month of careful handling. I like braided cords this one looked good. Well made with reinforcedments at the ends, nice extra length just gave out too fast.  Fail Amazon.

Thought the charger quit working and wrote a bad review. Then I started thinking about it and changed it to another thing you plug into the wall. Don't know the name of that part. Anyway it worked fine then, so sorry I made a mistake.

I destroy USB cables and I have tried to cheap it out in the past- they usually do not work with an Apple I Phone, but this one does and it stands up to my constant abuse. Well worth the money.In fact, I just bought another in a shorter length for the car as that one fell apart also.

I’ve bought a few of these 6ft gold ones to place around the house so I don’t have to keep moving cords. I love them. Sturdy (my robot vacuum ran over one and the rubber got a bit chewed up but it’s still just fine!), love the length makes it easy to sit in bed or on the couch and use it with ease. Great for the car too so the person in the back seat can charge their phone or control the music.

I really liked this at first.  I bought it for the hospital after having a baby and it worked great for the first few months.  It quit working now though.  My phone still charges with an Apple brand charger but it will only charge about 10-50% with this charger.  Disappointed.

I’ve had this braided cord for a month and so far so good. No complaints. Great lengths offered, longer than iPhone stock.******3 months in, it intermittently stops working. Cord, adapter, ports are all fine. Don’t waste your money on this one!******

Love these braided ones compared to Apple brand. These actually hold up better overtime, and are reinforced right by the charging connector so the infamous fraying doesn’t occur. 6ft is a great length too, I can plug it in right next to my bed and not have to use my phone at an odd angle. 10/10 would recommend to anyone

Haven’t had these chargers for two weeks yet and they’re A L R E A D Y going in and out. So frustrating, especially since I bought a dang 10 pack Bc the reviews were decent!!! Don’t fall for it. They’re junk!

The chord is still intact with no fraying or anything yet it still won’t charge half the time now? My iPad makes the noise like it’s being plugged in every few seconds unless you get it juuuust right. It wasn’t like that when I first got it so I’m stumped as to what went wrong.

I should have written this review months ago. The cord didn't hold up well and while recharging my ipad, I smelled a smoky odor. The cord and the ipad connection area were both over heated. I disconnected and stopped using it in fear of having a fire. There should be another rating other than "1 star" to address an issue such as this - maybe "dangerous".
I ordered a three foot cable. The box says three feet, so does the description. It is NOT three feet!

I don't even think I have had this charger a week and it already stopped working! I left my phone to charge last night, woke up and it is on 2%.  Tried a couple more times today to get it to work, but its done. Frustrating, I was hoping this was a good product as I liked the idea of having different colors for family members.

Cord lasts about 8 months before showing signs of wearing out. Sometimes you have to flip the connection to get the charge to start. But for the price and how long it lasted. Way better then the standard Apple cable.
I've had it for over a year and it still works with No visible damage

Strong and durable. I had to replace the Apple flimsy cord twice already til I finally had enough. I get a better cord at the fraction of the price with this corded one by Amazon. Very well made, had it for almost two years with no issues.
This is one of the best charging cords I’ve ever had. Even beats Apple’s cord that came with my phone! It has held up remarkably and I am hard on cords! The longer length was perfect, too!

My cats have tried to eat this many times. I do feed them, so I don't get why they need to eat all my cords, but it has held up wonderfully. It charges my Iphone quicker than any other charger I've had. And the woven pattern hides little tooth marks, in case your pets are as frustrating as mine.

I usually purchase the plain white iPhone charging cords by Amazon Basics, which last me around 4-6 month of continuous use (and i tend to batter them up quite a bit). I decided to spend a little extra and try the nylon braided version, and I really love it. It’s been a few months, and I would normally see some wear in the area where the lightning connector meets the slimmer area of the cord. But the nylon version is holding up great, I am so happy with it.

I love the length, material, and durability of this cable! Unfortunately, mine is only charging when plugged in with one side of the end facing up; when it is reversed my iPhone 8 either does not charge or says "This accessory may not be supported" and does not charge. As you know with Lightning cables, one of their benefits is the orientation of plugging in the cable shouldn't matter. Thus, it's been a big frustration for me that sometimes, when I plug my phone in and return later or the next morning, I find the phone hasn't charged.

It’s December, I’ve had this since August....and it’s still perfect. If I would have a lightening cableFrom Apple it would have broke already. These are durable and the length is fantastic. The price is definitely right to have one in every room. Might buy some just for travel Bc I love these so much
Got 2 of these and Stopped working after 3 months of usage.. product no good

This seems like it is decent quality but it keeps falling out of my iPhone 7 both with a minimalist Apple case and without a case at all.  I bought it to use in the car so its pretty much worthless for this purpose.  It would be ok if you want it sitting on a desk just to charge but not if you plan on using it while charging.  I will be returning this item.

Ordered a multipack and one of the cables doesn't work. Not the end of the world since I bought them as backups for the office since cables constantly grow feet. Otherwise they're nicely built and seem like they'll take a beating.
I have no idea why all the great reviews. It didn’t last two months.

Bottom line, this was an infrequently used cable and there is no visible damage, but it has still stopped charging.  It appears to have a good strain relief but has failed just like every other lightning cable as the circuit continuity eventually is compromised by loose internal connections or broken conductors.

This cable fits snugly through my Spigen iPhone 6a case and into my iPhone jack. Earlier I had written that this cable did not seem to fit snugly, but that was before I realized there were a few wads of lint in the phone's lightning-cable jack, which i removed with a paperclip lol.

This charger snapped off in my iPad.  The part that is inserted into the device is made of brittle material. It was not possible for me to fix it.  I had to pay about $50 to repair it.  Would not buy again.

I loved this but realized it charged super slowly and now I’ve been shocked twice in the last week. The second time it went through my whole body and didn’t have feeling back in my pinky for almost an hour. It hurt so much I involuntarily ripped the cord and my phone out of the wall and threw them.

This cord had pot performed many I have purchased previously. I must say, it must be the material. The length is awesome because it’s just enough to still use my phone if needed. It also seems to charge the phone in record time compared to other cords with the same plug. Very impressed and will purchase another.

These are fantastic cords.  Since I've use it, its held up to wear and tear and lots of use.  The connections are strong and the materials are great quality.  The 6' cord length is ideal to take traveling as many hotel rooms don't have outlets close to the bed.  Or at home so I can lay in bed and be on my phone.

I still use this cable that I bought over 14 months ago and it still looks like new. I used to have to replace my old cables so often, so I decided to spend the extra couple of dollars and get the braided one. It has been an amazing purchase and well worth the few dollars more. I would highly recommend this if you go through cables really quickly. Also, a 6-foot cable may seem long but you will appreciate the extra length more than you would think.

This charger was great for a very brief time. The length is excellent and the reinforced outer covering feels very well made, however its internal durability leaves a lot to be desired. I bought it only 25 days ago and it has already stopped consistently charging my phone. The power to my phone now constantly cuts out when charging the phone as if someone was unplugging and replugging it in. Although it might be more expensive, an actual Apple charger is probably the best way to go to save you headaches over buying questionable products like this.

I haven’t had this charger long but I noticed it gets really hot at the base and it makes my phone get hot so I’m really worried about using it now. I’m concerned it’s made my phone battery hold a charge less or that it could even start a fire.

This failed after a few months right at the lightning connector. I used it to charge my phone on my nightstand with the charger plugged in on the floor, so there was about a 6" diameter 180 degree turn just before the lightning connector.I replaced this with cable matters cable cable, which has held up well. Do yourself a favor and don't buy cheap cables.

I've bought several of these cords in silver, rose gold and gold. They last longer than OEM versions and are more stylish. Amazon really did their homework. The cord works just as well if not better than my factory cord. It's reinforced on both ends which prevent the bending and breaking issue. The braided cord also is more durable. I bought our first over a year ago and liked it so much bought more for the rest our home. We have one in every room. The colors are great because we have a cord to match our phones. Honestly can't recommend these enough.

Was great. Then it wasn't. 3 months later, it stopped charging. No kinks, no tears. Still in mint condition, but won't charge. I have original apple cords that are fraying that I've taped up with electrical tape that still work 2 years later.

I purchased this cable to charge my iPhone 6. From the start it was erratic. I had to slightly rock the input connection in order to maintain charging. I did this for a couple of months until I figured out that the cord was not good for the phone. My last attempt displayed a warning on the phone that the "accessory not compatible" (something like that!)I waited too long to return it . Covad-19 set us all back. Lesson learned.

I have to buy a new one at least once a year since they’re always breaking but these do seem to last longer than other ones I’ve had so I keep coming back here because of the price and the free shipping.

I bought these because the normal OEM cords just don’t hold up. These braided are constructed well and come with a handy Velcro tie to keep it together. I bought a 10 pack, because why not?  This is actually the second order of these. I liked the first one so much I bought for the car, I ordered these. Recommended.

I’ve bought multiple diff packs of chargers from amazon and this wire has lasted the longest.. it’s been like 4-5 months and no issues! It’s a good length and I love that it has a braided rope around the wire so it won’t rip easy.

I have bought Amazon Basic charging cords in the past and they worked great. Wanted another one to stay at work. Come to find out I cannot get apple car play to work with this cord. All of my other cords allow for car play, even the gas station one. This cord, nope won’t allow for car play. I have no idea how since it supposedly “Apple certified”. Very disappointed.

I don’t have a rose gold problem, but if I did, I’d buy this, anyway. This is way stronger, nicer, longer, and better than the crap that actually came with my $900 phone. Thanks apple 🙄 but THANK YOU VERY MUCH, AmazonBasics!

This product has a shelf life. It surely lived a full life with me for about a year or so. It traveled to many places and got its full use. The usb side and the side that clicks into my iPhone started to fall apart a lot. The length is a real game changer for someone who hasn’t had a cord this length

Had such high hopes. I really thought this material would mean I wouldn’t have to keep replacing my iPhone Chargers. Bought it in May and it’s already having issues where if I move my phone at all it buzzes and stops charging but if I move it ever so slightly again it’ll go back to charging. Great product if you can charge your phone in one spot and not touch it until it’s charged.

Less than a month and it stopped working! I read reviews on people having similar issues but went out on a limb because I thought mine would be different plus I really love the color; well that wasn’t the case and nice I’m left disappointed and with nothing to charge my phone.

I usually trust Amazon branded stuff, buy this cable really let me down. As we all know, aftermarket lightning connectors can be hit or miss, only the apple ones works great. Seeing as this was "MFi Certified" I thought it would hold up. I was wrong. Very disappointed.
very good quality.  Better than buying apple cables.

I love the look and feel of this cord.  It appears to be sturdily built.  My other cords eventually fray and crack at the plug end and this one appealed to be because it has extra reinforcements at both ends.  The braiding also appears to be quite durable.  I did not have any problems using this cord with my case that I have on my iPhone, unlike some people have reported.

I just purchased my third one. They last approximately 18 to 20 months. I give mine daily use and take it with me as well. For the price, you cannot ask for anything more! It charges all my Apple products quickly as well. Definitely recommend this iPhone Charger.

I needed a charger for my car that wouldn't melt in heat and wasn't too long or short. This has been great. It charges my phone at a comparable speed to the official iPhone chargers and has a much higher quality material. I haven't noticed any fraying or separating. It plugs in easily to both the USB and iPhone. I will buy again when I need another charger.

This lightening cable works well, but it is very stiff and kinks easily. I thought it would loosen up a bit after use, but I’ve had it for a couple of months now and it’s just as stiff as when I bought it.

I ordered this and it stopped working in two weeks. It keeps saying it isn't a supported accessory. This is the third one I bought. Just for argument's sake, I have a ten and an 8 plus and it worked on neither. I am just going to spend the extra and order directly from Apple to save myself the aggravation.

This is my new favorite charger!  I was getting so annoyed by how flimsy the Apple chargers were and tired of replacing frayed chargers every few months.  I ponied up and bought this and I'm so glad I did.  This thing can bend any which way and so far, it's holding up incredibly well.  I will definitely be buying more of these in the future.

I have been very happy with this charging cord.  Its much more durable than the Apple brand cord.  It comes with a little Velcro strap so that you can wrap the cord neatly when you're not using it.  The extra reinforcement where the plugs meet the cord is nice too.  That is where every charger I have ever had has failed.I would buy this again.

I really wanted to like these cables, but unfortunately they are cheaply made. The actual lightning connector at the end of each cable broke after minimal use. Thankfully Amazon's excellent customer service team refunded me for the purchase.

Charger lasted 2.5 months and now it doesn’t charge anymore.  Tried to get refund but I cannot.  There were other reviews who posted a similar experience.  I should’ve listened.Save your money!!! Don’t Buy

It's a great charging cable. Liked the length I chose(6ft), I like the fact it was braided, worked well for a year and i charged my phone nightly next to my bed. After a year it started to fall apart and the lightning tip became loose and wouldn't consistently charge. What can you expect? I'm content with it seeing as I paid like 10 bucks.

Love it.  I have boys and no boy wants a rose gold cord.  No more "oh I thought it was my cord" challenge.  Works great, solid sturdy quality.  I have had this a record amount of time... over a year and still works great and I still actually have it in my possession it has not suddenly disappeared with any of my kids LOL.  Solution to a first world problem.

I purchased in September 2017, and I am just now starting to have issues with it disconnecting/reconnecting if it is not stationary. I liked that it came with the little Velcro attachment to help keep it rolled up but it fell off and god lost somewhere in my car.

I've been using this charging cable for over a year without issue, however I have recently started using it to charge an iPad with Touch ID and have found that it breaks Touch ID while charging. I no longer have a Touch ID iPhone to test with, but assume the issue would be the same. Not that it's the end of the world that I have to either unplug to unlock my device or type in my passcode, but a genuine Apple Lightning Cable does not have this issue, and I would have expected better from a "MFi certified" cable.
Didn't even last a month before it it stop charging my iPad.

Overall, the length is just what I wanted, same for color and charging power. However, if you have any experience with charging cords for apple products, you know they fray terribly and quickly. This is the first cord I've bought that hasn't begun deteriorating away yet!

I have had this cord for a couple of months and so far I am very pleased with it. I'm not sure how I ever managed without it. I don't know why Apple doesn't just include a longer charging cord when you buy an iphone. I am planning on purchasing another in the near future for work.

I run through chargers like no other. I've had this charger for a year and it's still working and isn't torn at all. No "iphone does not support this accessory" notifications either. Always get MFi chargers for that reason! The braid has kept it in good shape. Long length is nice but I wish I would have gotten a 10 foot.

Amazing quality. Ordered one of these almost a year ago for my boyfriend and it’s worked perfectly. The extra length is SO necessary. These are durable, long lasting, sleek, and so much better than a typical charger. Even came with small Velcro fastener for easy travel.Don’t hesitate, just buy this if you’re even remotely thinking about it

I don't like the cost of the official apple branded cords so I looked for alternatives. After trying multiple brands among different price ranges I came along to this one. It hasn't failed me yet and gets used daily.

This wire is a must for iPhone users! It works great and since it's nylon braided you know it's super durable. I've been using mine for about a year now and it still works great. Definitely recommend!

By far the best lightning cables I own, I've purchased several of these. I recommend the 6ft over the 3ft due to versatility and overall value. I have USB outlets at home, and the 6ft reaches nicely for when you're on the couch. In the office, the 6ft cable leaves slack on my desk from the plugs in the surge protectors on the floor under my desk. My girlfriend also left the cable hanging out the car dorr as we drove, and although scuffed up quite a bit, the robust, well-made cable still works. I don't give 5-stars easily, but this cable is 5+.If you have Apple devices, buy the 10-pack. You'll find uses for them, and you'll never be searching again.

I bought two of these chargers, one for my sister and one for me. Both of ours stopped working after 2 months. We started having problems a month in. At first it only worked on one side or if you positioned it a certain way. Then it stopped working altogether. For the 2 months I had the charger it was great - just wish it lasted longer.

Disappointing. Absolutely loved this for the first 6 weeks. Was able to reach the entire length of couch or reach further than any other cord. After about a month and a half if just doesn’t charge sometimes. You can mess with it enough to start working but not worth keeping if it won’t work long term. Wouldn’t recommend just because you’ll need to replace so quickly.

This is garbage. I’m actually on my second, after a month, the first one went out so amazon sent another. Well, it’s been almost a month and this one is going out. I never move it, it stays right by my couch at all times and is never tampered with. There’s absolutely no reason for it to keep going out except that they are pure garbage.
Lasted about 1.5 years of light use. Good until it stopped working.
Muy bueno

I bought two of these and within about a month, both of them stopped working. I guess you get what you pay for sometimes. The durability of the actual cord seems good. I underestimated how short the cord was going to be. It did charge well while it worked.

Super long cord helps reach longer than any other I have.  The pretty pink color helps me keep mine from being confused with others in our home. It works with my old and new smart phone so I’m very happy with it.  Bought a second one.

My roommate raves about amazon chargers but I'm not pleased. I got this one thinking it'll last a long time especially since its the reinforced one but I've only had it for two days and it consistently stops charging. I don't know if its worth returning though because I need a charger and can't wait another few days for a new one. I'm confused why it stopped working so suddenly, I even check to make sure it wasn't my phone but my phone is charging perfectly fine on other peoples chargers. I'm confused and upset.

This cord has held up to daily use without coming apart at the cord/charger connection point. I’ve tried several different types and none of the others lasted more than a month or two. I am very happy that this one still looks brand new after months of using it .
This cable has lasted 6 months and still charges my iPad without any issues.I can charge while using it to stream while in bed.

This charger worked great for 4 months, it was durable & I would give physical aspects of the cord five stars. For reference, this cord is used usually once daily. However,I’ve had this charger for 5 months & around month 4 it only let me charge my phone using a specific side of the pin adapter, for example it will only charge my phone if the amazon basics brand side is facing the screen side of the phone but not the other way around. Still charges on the side it likes very quickly so I can’t say this is a bad buy, it just might not last as long as one would want. 3 stars only for the short shelf life.

The only cord I have gotten that wasn't made by apple that is actually worth anything.  Most other USB lightning cords I've gotten have broken immediately....not this one!  Still going, lightning end hasn't bent or broken, long cord, inexpensive...I can recommend this!

I have two of these now, both are of good construction and feel durable. One I have been using for about a year in multiple locations and different power levels, I have never had any issues with it. I bought a second one a few weeks ago and it also works great.

It was a great charger it seemed. Fast charging as they advertise. But 2 major things have disappointed me, one is there was no box was included which actually sucks. And one time after using it just the other day there was a large burn mark across the whole lightning charger plate insert. Not sure why or how this happened.

It worked great for six months... Like exactly to the day. Started using May 15, 2019 and it stopped charging my phone on November 15, 2019. I've tried plugging it into different outlets and different phones, but the cord is the issue. No physical deterioration or other signs that it wouldn't be working.There's supposed to be a limited warranty (1 year), so I'm hoping maybe I can get a replacement? Kind of bummed about this because the charging cable was perfect other than it just up and dying on me :(

This works with my iPhone 7 Plus that is in my Otter box case!  I have had problems in the past finding a long cord that doesn’t have a bulky lightening cord plug which would prevent me from even plugging into my phone. This one is thin enough on the end that I don’t have to take my phone out of its case to charge!
This cord lasted over a year and kept its charging capabilities. A great value for the price.

It’s pretty great. I bought this product in 2018 and it still works now. That may not seem that long, but it’s still more than half price of what apple charges and would probably last around the same time. It just started doing that annoying thing where it charges off and on (but it isn’t happening as frequently). I’m still using this charger. In my opinion it has lasted a while now and that’s the main thing I’m looking for. Most of my apple chargers’ life span are just getting shorter and shorter. I would recommend buying this.

Cord is the size advertised, but my old one was longer so it’s been an adjustment. Charging power is great and it’s SUPER durable. Doesn’t feel like it’s going to split or anything. Doesn’t feel cheap at all. Awesome price for the quality

Bought three of these iPhone chargers in mid July. Two out of three have quit working and it’s not even the end of September yet. These cords never leave my bedroom, never mishandled and always in a safe, dry and cool place. Beyond disappointed with Amazon basics.
I can honestly say, this charger is one of those rare chargers that last and survive you. I have bought a few because I gave my other ones to my kids. Yes, they still have them and they still work.

ordered several of these and I wish I had tried them immediately upon receiving them.  Too late to return them now, but I would if I could.  The lightning connector will not remain seated, so the connection is lost upon the slightest motion.  For example, I plug the phone in, it starts charging; I set the phone down on the table, it stops charging.  I pick up the phone and repeat the process.  Then I give up and retrieve my worn out old cheapo cable from the trash and use that.  At least it works most of the time.

I love these long nylon braided cables. They charge well and are durable. My new kitten chewed through my MacBook charger cable in about 10 seconds (had to spend like $80 on a replacement) but she hasn’t been able to damage these lightning cables even though she has tried chewing on them! Just wish I could get a nylon braided MacBook charger...
Busted after a week. Frayed at the iPad side. Tried taping over it with electrical tape and found that it was getting hot. Returned it.

Went with this braided product to have a good strong charger that didn’t fray. Was great for a couple weeks then stopped charging my phone . I blamed it on my phone but it charges perfectly with any other charger, even my old frayed one. Disappointed on the purchase. What a waste

Charger works well but it charges soooooo slow. At one point my phone couldn’t recognize the charger but once I stopped receiving that message the charger works but just charges my phone so slowly. It’s probably on its last legs even though I’ve only had it for about 2 months.

Works well with my kids iPads, the cables that came with the ipads were too short and were always starting to break at the ipad end of the cable, these have been holding up better so far and are long enough to where they can use the iPad while its charging instead of sitting on top of the outlet.

Spend a little extra money and skip this one. I thought they looked great and loved the lengths this came in however it doesn’t mean anything because it stopped working - at first I could get “ not compatible “ messages and now nothing when I plug it in - no charge.

So far so good. Have had this for a couple months and use it a couple times a day, depending on what I use my phone for throughout the day. It’s very durable, especially at the ends where normal charge cords drag and whatnot. Nice and long cord so I don’t have to hold my phone close to the plug! Good price too.

Everything was fine for the first 5 months, then it just abruptly stopped working.  All of a sudden, it is no longer compatible and won't charge my devices.  Skip the headache and get the official cable for your device.

Loves these cords. I have been buying these cords for months. Been replacing my original Iphone cords once they break. These cords have yet to fail me. Strong, durable and haven’t had any errors connect to phone as most knock off IPhone cords tend to do. They also do not bend at lighting connection as do most charges also do. It also comes with a Velcro strap for clean looking storage. Over time it does tend to come off if pulled hard but goes right back on. Velcro isn’t as strong as it was at first but in fairness I use it a lot and still works good. Been using them for over 6 months.

I got this a few days ago. It’s made of a nice material and charges my phone super quickly which is something I was really surprised about. It also came with a nice Velcro piece attached to it to keep the cord rolled when you’re not using it which is nice. If it only lasts a few months I’d still be happy with the purchase.

Great cord!  I've had this for months and no signs of wear.  My boyfriend loves that it's one of the few cords that allow him to charge his phone while in his otterbox case.  Which led to him stealing my cord.  But these are so reasonably priced that I just hopped on and bought another!  I highly recommend this cord, especially if you have a case that has trouble with larger cords.

This is the 3rd one I’ve purchased in the past 18 months. The first one I purchased lasted about a year. The second one (purchased 3 months old) is still working but the newest one I purchased (just over a month ago) stopped working already. I’m pretty disappointed with these charger cords at this time... :(((

This is a definitely winner fo AmazonBasics!  At 6 feet the length alone is reason enough to buy it, but add in the reinforced ends and braided nylon cord and I'd rate it much better than the original/replacement cords from Apple.  The price is right, too!  I ordered two, but will likely order more for the grandkids who just destroy the standard ones.
I have been using it for a year. It works perfect. It charges my phone fast.The wire is pretty, flexible and long. Very happy with my purchase.

I have gone through many cords.  Different brands and this one is one of the 2 best performing cords in terms of still holding up and not having the point where the cord enters the rectangle that charges the device strip or deteriorate in some manner.  No Issues so far.

I bought 3 of these. I bought one for use at home everyday. After about a year or so, I noticed that it's starting to come apart a little bit. It's still usable but worth keeping in mind. The second one I bought for use in my car. It tends to fall out of the phone socket sometimes but that might be because my phone is old. The last one i bought for a relative and it works but it's also starting to come apart.

I've had this since March of 2019. It was great for the first few months. I didn't have any real issues. Around September or October the wire started acting up. It would not always connect but worked well enough that I kept using it. Now in November it will constantly disconnect and reconnect making charging impossible. I would NOT buy this product again.

Look. I'm one of those people that (accidentally of course) has stuff constantly break on them. I seriously used to have to buy a new charger every 3 months or so. It was ridiculous. But then I bought one of these because, why not, it's cheap, right? And low-and-behold I have had one of these chargers for OVER A YEAR. Yeah. Over a year. It is amazing, it hasn't frayed or broke on me. It is very sturdy and I tell literally everyone who has an iPhone about these. They are amazing. I bought this one recently to have a second one at work. Don't waste your time on Apple, or Belkin, or whoever. Just get this one. Trust me. (don't sue if it doesn't work out though thanks)

Very unhappy; Cable was not always recognized by the iphone, but I didn't report it because plugging it in again worked.  After a bit more time it stopped working at all.  Cable was only used once a night and physically is in perfect condition, but because I did not report the initial problem the replacement window closed.  In comparison my original cables are hanging on by a thread (lots of use all around and sheath is worn through) but still work just fine.  Find a better product

DO NOT BUY THIS CHARGER. DO NOT BUY THIS CHARGER.I had high hopes for this charger since it was recommended by someone who had it for the past three years. My guess is that the new chargers they are making are crap and are not the same ones as before.
We only use this cord for our vehicle for charging tablets on roadtrips for the kids, so not a ton of use, but the tabs quickly wore out and will not stay plugged in and charging the devices.
One of the best chargers I’ve had.I usually use my phone to read books, listen to music and often scroll through meme’s like most people.

I love this cable, I have purchased Amazon Basic Lightning cables for years now and never been disappointed but when I seen the braided cable I had to try it... it's great, I've used it daily for several months now and still good as new! I have an otter box on my iPhone and no problems plugging it in. I have replaced all my regular cables with the braided cable now. 👍🏼

This cable is very well made.  The braided covering makes it much more durable than the rubbery plastic of standard cables (and, importantly for some of us, less tempting as a nibble to my cat at least).  The junction between cable and connectors on each end is reinforced nicely.  I frankly can't think of anything that could make the cable stronger that it hasn't got.Amazon sells similar cables by other makers that cost more.  I can't see any reason to spend the extra amount.

Works great. Charges my phone fast. I bought this because the rubber on the cable looked durable -- which is usually the part that makes my charging cables unusable. It feels sturdy and the metal is cool to the touch on the cord, which makes it feel a little more higher quality than plastic. Overall, a pretty good charger!

I had the old version of the amazon basics charger for iPhone. It lasted forever and I couldn’t have been more impressed by it. When I went to repurchase, they had made new ones and I decided to spend the couple more dollars to get the nicer one thinking it would last me a long time anyways. I couldn’t have been more wrong. After one month, the charger stopped working if it was plugged into my phone with the amazon logo pointed up. Finally, after 3 months, it completely stopped working without any visual damage on the cord. I am extremely disappointed and wish I could find something with the durability of the old amazon basics cord.

I really wanted to like these cords, they feel nice and thick and I like the colors. The one in my car, which sees less regular use than most of our chargers, still died in a month despite having no visible damage. How hard is it to make a phone cord that doesn't suck?Edit: the second one broke too. UGH.

I've been using the Apple cord for as long as I've had an iPhone. It usually starts to fray by the time it's been a year or they just stop charging. I'm glad I bought this one. I actually have 2 now. One for work and one for the car. Quality product and the color matches my phone. The cord is wrapped to keep it from fraying and from minor wear and tear.
I bought this the beginning of January, and it’s already acting up. If the cord isn’t at just the right angle, it disconnects. I’ve had actual Apple cords last longer. Not impressed.

So far this charger cord has been great. It is sturdy and seems well made. I have bought other charger cords, but this seems to be the best for the price compared to the others. The head which plugs into your device is very small and fits into pretty much and device with a case on it. The nylon feels great.Pros:

The small end of the cord I guess that’s the lightning end/plug is very loose and you have to jiggle it a lot to get it to actually charge and if it gets moved it stops charging. *****Update******they replace the first one I bought and it’s Just as bad,it’s just a piece of crap.It looks nice but it doesn’t work.  DON’T buy it !!!!!!

Old apple charger of same length frayed near charger head after less than one year. This cord is significantly cheaper and feels much better quality. The 6 foot length is best, but shorter version works for shorter needs (like in the car/etc).

I've always been skeptical of cheaper priced chargers for my iPhone. For a while I just got the apple certified chargers that are costly and break too quickly, so I started looking for alternative brands that work good and don't tear up after having it for a little while. I decided to try this one out as it had good reviews and I wasn't disappointed! It charges just as good as an Apple charger and has lasted a very long time with the braided material on the outside. I'd recommend. 😊

Just got these beauties and as long as durability is legit as it appears to me, these will continue to be my go to cords. They are sleek, come in a nice small box, and are a great length for counter and cars.

We have three little ones notorious for finding unmanned chargers & eating the ends of them. This is the only charger to withstand actual chewing! Every other charger is inferior to this one & has succumbed to juvenile teeth chewing it to bite- this seemingly made of steel charger lives on! You will NOT be disappointed!

Don't waste your money. At first this charger worked great, but after one month it stopped charging. It looks like it is intact and I can't see any reason why it won't charge anymore. It's a piece of junk, just like so many cell phone charging cords.  Why won't any of them last longer than a few weeks? It's so frustrating!!

I wanted to wait a few months to give an honest review to see how durable this cable was and I’m impressed. I live in Miami where it’s hot as ever and leave the cable in my car and it still works perfectly well! I love that it’s long so the people sitting in the back have no problem using it too.

It caused my laptop to crash. I plugged it into my laptop at work and it constantly made the hardware connect/disconnect noise.  Then It caused my laptop to crash.  After three crashes in two days, I realized it was the cable and removed it and no more laptop problems. Also, my iPhone makes constant noise when plugged in.

I ordered this charging cord 2 years ago and it’s still doing great.  Quite frankly, it’s one of the few cords  that hasn’t frayed or kinked.  It appears to be made of good quality material.  I would easily purchase again, if needed.

I love this cord! I had my first one for about a year before I broke it. Other cords have lasted for a few months before breaking. Also a great length to use wherever you may need to! I have purchased this as  a gift multiple times as well!

I never disconnect any of my charging cords by pulling on the wire!!  I always disconnect carefully by holding onto the hard plastic tab, yet it always wears out just underneath this tab.  The fact is whether it's braided or not braided wire Amazon (and other suppliers) don't engineer these cords to last.  In my case 6 months.  It is inconceivable to me that a better wire cannot be built in 2020.  Or is that by design ???

After growing tired of replacing the Apple-provided and also separately purchased cables that all split and frayed near the USB connector, I decided to try this one. After more than 6 months of daily use it still looks like new. And the pink color makes it easy to pick out as mine when traveling.

I was impressed by the initial quality of this cord. It feels stout and the connectors are made from what appears to be a durable plastic. Time will tell if this holds up better than other cords, but for the price, I can’t complain as long as it lasts as long as others. The little Velcro strap is a nice touch. Will buy others.
This charger is more durable than the original one.  I thought I would have to replace or repair my iphone 6.  The phone charges quickly and completely and does not discharge as it did before.

UPDATE: 2 years+ and this charger is still going strong!!Finally a non-Apple brand charger that works! This is by far the best charger I’ve ever purchased for a device. I am rough on my charging cords, they come every where with me. I have had this cable for about 6 months and no signs of wear and tear, and it charges just as quickly as an apple charger.
Love this cord and I’ve gone through way too many to count. Very heavy feels durable, charges quickly, see no fraying or weak spots and the colors are super pretty too! bonus!!

I had the previous Amazon Basics lighting cables that were white and plastic. They died after a few months because the connector area wore down and they would only work if you jiggle the wire at certain angles. These are made of a nice metal and reinforced by firm rubber. The braided outer skin also helps add to the durability of this cable. I don't see this falling apart anytime soon. Well recommended!

I have to admit, I was skeptical at first. All my other non-OEM cables have only lasted a few weeks at the most before they turned to junk. This cable is AWESOME! Charges quickly and it’s built to last! Completely satisfied with my purchase!

These Amazon basic chargers are awesome, they are thicker and covered in a braided material to make them stronger. I bought the 10 pack because my husband and children always need charges and 6' is a nice very useful length.

So far, so good. It’s not showing any signs of wear, but it’s really not that old yet. I would like to see longer and tapered strain reliefs. Right where the cable exit the connectors is where the mist bending takes place. A long tapered strain relief would be beneficial to the longevity of the cable.

These will charge an iPhone 6 or 7 for a short period of a time (less than a year); then you’ll get a message that states “accessory not compatible.” I’ve used this successfully with both a wall plug and a portable charger, but it randomly quit charging. I made the mistake of buying the pink cords a second time, and since they had been working (hoping the first purchase was just a fluke), bought the 6 foot cords in silver for my daughter. So far so good, but just waiting for my “error message!” Such a bummer!!

I absolutely love these chargers! I bought 6ft chargers for me, my boyfriend, and my little sister and it has lasted us 2 years already and are still working great! I love the length of the chargers and being able to charge while laying in bed, or at my desk when doing work. Unlike the regular Apple chargers, these DO NOT rip. They have stayed in tact no matter how much wear and tear they’ve been through. I got new Apple chargers when getting and new phone and with my AirPods but I have not opened or touched them because these amazon basic chargers work so much better! 10/10 recommend!!!!

This product has a protective "coating" on the line to reduce fraying, bending and twisting. My puppy decided to chew on it during the night. Even his sharp teeth did no damage. Good product. Quality product.

Stay away from the dark grey cord! I bought 4 cords, each a different color. The other three (silver, gold, rose gold) are working great. But the dark grey I got a replacement immediately upon receipt due to first one was dead. The replacement appears to engage when plugged in but doesn’t charge up at all. I can’t believe this is coincidence when the others are perfect.
Super high quality! Very Thick wire that does not tangle and appears to be very durable.  Charge time is as good as whatever base you are using.  Great buy, thank you Amazon for pricing this right!

Love these cables. I’ve purchased several after having long term success with my first cable. All of my APPLE devices recognize the cable and charge just like a certified APPLE cable. Still going strong after several months of usage. Love the ease to wrap them up and the small Velcro closure to keep them wrapped tight.

Excellent durable charger, my go to for chargers is amazon basics, the quality is unmatchedMuch better than the junk apple supplies you with that only lasts like 6 months, amazon basics chargers will last you years If not more

Easy to overpraise, bu these cables are just right for my use - heavy-duty enough to not have to sweat the occasional stepping-on/water splashing on/kittens playing with, but not so long as to be a nuisance.They transfer power and data just fine, so they're even better than the Official Apple Cables included with my iOS Devices.

Super strong cord. Works as well as the Apple cord and it is stronger than the Apple cord. It is flexible but more like a strongly covered durable wire. It can bend & twist & stays the way you twist it.
This charger works well on Apple products.  My cats like to attack the cord from time to time.  They have bit, chewed  and kicked this cord and it did not damage the cord (or the cats).
Old time wires had it right with outer jacket braiding. Not surprised the design is resurrecting in the digital age. Having this cord on my desk, in my car or on my kitchen counter is not an eyesore.
The original cord for my iPhone's charger frayed over time from use -- this cord is sturdy (will not, I don't believe) kink and fray like the OE that came with my phone. Very happy to have this...

We continue to buy these as they seem to go missing!! The length (6ft) is awesome, I like the material and it is durable - I just wish people would stop taking them lol. Always seems to charge fast too with our plug (anker).

Had the cord for a week before it’s started malfunctioning, it constantly makes the phone buzz as if you keep pluging and unplugging it. It is unfortunate because I have used this in the past and they were great. Guess I will be on the search for a new replacement coord

We’ve been using this cord for two months now to charge our 2 iPhone 8+ and our daughter’s iPhone 6. It charges quickly and is very durable. Our phones are in OtterBox Defender, OtterBox Commuter and OtterBox Symmetry cases and the lightning end fits into the phones nicely without having to remove the cases. I’m back to buy a second cord right now to keep in another location. Great cord!

After a year this cable no longer charges. It is in perfect condition, as it stayed attached to my roll top desk.  Before it totally quit, my iPhone X would say “using unauthorized cable”. Will not buy again. Should have stuck with Apple.

Here is why this gets a three star rating - you only get one cable and not two.  I bought this product twice and the first time I thought I made a mistake, and that’s the reason why I didn’t complain. This time I paid particular attention. I dislike misleading information on buying any product.  Buyers, be mindful before you purchase.  By the way, it is a better cable than the original apple cable imo.
Very nice product. You would never guess it wasn’t made by Apple. Great quality. I never knew they had such inexpensive yet great quality chargers. Will be buying more

Didn't know this type of lightning cable existed, but this type has sure made things a lot more convenient. I've always been afraid of ruining my cables because the regular Apple ones seem as if they'll break easily if they get folded too often. This type of lightning cable is convenient for everyday use whether outside or at home. I don't have to worry about folding or breaking it because of the material surrounding the cable. Charges normally like a regular Apple lightning cable as well.

Most reviews are shortly after this cord was bought...... I’ve had this cord for three months. It’s burnt out and barely works anymore . This cord was great for like the first two months. Now it’s burnt at the end and barely charges my phone. Only had it for three months. Annoyed

Not one to write reviews but I had to with this because I’m constantly bragging and surprised w how LONG this charger last me. Its about to be 2 years since I’ve bought this charger and now is when it’s reaching it’s end time. Still charges but it flickers on and off. So I’m about to buy another one to replace it. If you leave your phone alone while charging (like I believe you should do but we’re addicts so we use while charging) it charges fine. Best long lasting charger I’ve had so far

I don't know why some people complain about this charging cord. I found this product very good quality based on its price and so far it is good after 3 weeks. I hope it will do the same for a longer period of time.
This was working fine but has decided to suddenly stop working less that 6 months later. Super frustrating because I’m currently on an island and now I have a broken charging cord. *sigh*

I am so happy with this charger.  The cording is sturdy and has extra protection around the plugs (USB), both going into the phone and the adapter.  My Apple chargers seem to crack in these areas.  The charger works well and keeps my iPhone and iPad charged well in a short time.

This cable worked beautifully with and iPhone 5s connected to a cigarette lighter adapter for a car.  I think the braided cables are the way to go because eventually the non-braided ones crack and break at the connection.  I have never had any trouble with a braided cable as yet.

I ordered this because I own an IPhone and go through chargers like toilet paper. This is actually one of the worst chargers I've ever used and I once had a charger that fell apart on day3. This charger has had a connection issue since the minute I plugged it in. It's only actually charging 80% of the time but I get the stupid "plugged in" sound continuously. iPhone users will know what I'm talking about, you know when your charger is starting to die on you and you hear the dreaded death song. This charger has been singing to me since day one. I paid $14 for this and I spend most of my plugged in time, trying not to throw my phone.
Finally! A power cord that holds up to daily use. I use it to charge my iPad nightly. The cord gets pulled and yanked A LOT, pand I’m ecstatic to report the cord looks and works like it’s brand new!

We've gone thru multiple cable chargers within the past year or two and we decided it was about time to buy something more sturdier and longer lasting. With the Nylon braids it really helps keep its strength especially when you're not being mindful like me and tend to just tug the wire off the adapter. There are many factors that leads to the wire wearing out that sometimes isn't in our control either. This one is so sturdy and totally worth the price you are paying for!

I’ve had this lightning cord for several months now, and it truly was a great purchase. It lives in my purse, and has saved me many times when I’ve been at work with a dying phone. It’s very sturdy, and doesn’t feel like it could break easily like some other lightning cables I’ve had in the past. It was a great price too. Another small but nice detail is that the cord comes with a little Velcro piece attached to it, so it’s easy to neatly store your cable when it’s not in use. Would definitely recommend this cable.

Your product of the six feet gold Iphone 7 plus charger is not up to par with my expectations. This charger is unable to provide me with a fast battery renewal in my times of need. Although it works, the paste that it charges my phone at is extremely useless unless I am charging my phone overnight. Which according to the Apple Corporation is not recommended. The charger is most definitely not deserving of  5 stars but 3. I hope you can improve on this product so it could be more reliable in the future. This was not worth the price of 13 dollars and 98 cents. I hope this is helpful to your company.

I love having a long cord, but I have definitely experienced some issue with charging. For example, sometimes I need to unplug the cord, switch the usb converter, fuss around with it a bit. But all in all, it’s a nice cord. The length is amazing and I like the color.

Color looks exactly like the photo. The length is long long long. I bought one for work and home by my bed and my battery is now never low! The hardest part about charging your phone at night is putting it down and now I don’t have to :)

I recently got a side table that has a USB plug next to my bed. This cord is perfect with it. I flip around (away from the side table side of the bed) and still be on my phone. It charges very quickly and is extremely durable (compared to normal Apple cords)
I’ve been very impressed with this cord. I bought it a while ago and it still is in great shape. It doesn’t fast charge but it meets my needs. Highly recommend this for a sturdy cord.

Out of the box it felt like this was going to be a great addition to my room because of the braided cord and the length, this cable has never been able to charge my phone. At the beginning i thought it was just my phone but it never worked with my friends phones either. So maybe it was the outlet? Nope, i tried all the outlets in my home, didn’t work. So maybe it was the usb box? Nope, i have about ten and none of them worked. Guess it’s what i get for buying a cheap cable. Thanks amazon

This is a nice looking, long cord. I can’t give it 5 stars because the head is too big for my phone case. All of the Apple chargers fit my phone case but this one, as well as most non Apple cords, do not. It’s annoying to pull the bottom of my case off each night and to scroll through my phone while it’s plugged in is annoying with the bottom of the case off.
This cord is not some " rinky  dink'' cord.This thing is heavy duty .My family uses these almost exclusively.  The old type have been phased out .A nice way to say kicked to the curb.

This is the second time I’ve purchased the Amazon Basics nylon braided lightning cable. The first cable worked well for a few months and then became difficult to connect. I would plug it into my iPad and find later that connection hadn’t been made and the device had not charged. I ordered a new cable recently and the new cable hasn’t connected well right out of the box. The charging light on the device will flash rapidly. I’ve gone bAck to using Apple cables that came with my devices.

I had this charging cable less than two months and it broke off in my iPad requiring a trip to the Apple store for repair. Fortunately, Apple was able to remove the broken piece and the charging port was not damaged. Very disappointed in the quality of this item.

These are our favorite phone cords! They always work (not like other brands that quit after a month) and they upload very well. I think they are better than the apple brand charging cords. I love the different sizes you can order. I have 3 different sizes (for different reasons) and all have been GREAT!! Will never buy another brand.

After using this for months, it's still going strong. I've had so many cables short out on me over the past decade that I've switched to these heavier duty braided cables. So far, I haven't had one go bad -- including the AmazonBasics versions.

This is my second purchase of this style of charge cord.  I like the material much better than the standard rubber charge cord material from Amazon Basics.  Both rubber traditional chargers I purchased previously have separated at the transition where the cord meets the phone lightning piece and I had to bind with electrical tape; this nylon cord is much more durable and I have had no separation issues with it.

These charging cables are the real deal. They charge my phone so much faster and are way more durable. We have replaced all of our cords with these. Great buy. Also 3ft. are the same size as the Apple cords, 6ft. is great if you need more distance.
I like the braided covering on the charger because I think they last a lot longer than the plastic ones. This charger lasted me over a year before it started only working in certain positions

I have been so aggravated at buying iPhone cables, cheap to very expensive with the same results, always coming apart at the ends,  not so with this cable.  The covered end points have not budged or bent yet.  The length is also perfect.  I have purchased another one for my car.  If you are tired of throwing out cables you need to try this one.  Of course do take it out of the jacks by grasping the rubber/plastic part.  Finally a good cable!

Bought this for my boyfriend. It only charges when plugged in a certain way and sometimes not at all. I’ve had one of these chargers before and it was very durable, so maybe the one that came this time is just defective? Either way, it was disappointing and essentially a waste of money :/
Our home is filled with these cords as they are reliable and come at a great price. We have not had any issues with charging or tearing on any of the cords we have had for years.

These things last! By far my favorite charging cable. They are a little pricey compared to others but These just don’t seem to get ruined. My moms had one for almost 2 years now and it still looks like new so I went ahead and bought it too.Having the extra length is so convenient too! Totally worth the extra bucks cause you’ll end up saving overtime since you don’t have to replace them as often as most iPhone chargers.

I bought one of these cords a couple years ago and liked the durability and length so much that I’ve purchased them for almost everyone in my family as a gift. They hold up to teenage boys well too! We now have one in almost every room plus the cars.
I purchased the rose gold cable to use in my Jeep. I use it for the Apple Car Play and charging my phone. It works great, as I have not had any issues with it. I love the rose gold color too.
Durability is key here. It does not break where the cord meets the charger tip. I’ve had several of these in differing lengths and they are marvelous.

The absolute worst charging cord. The first cord went bad within the first week of use. The replacement they sent me had a shortage straight out of the box. I do not recommend. Do not waste your money.

It’s very difficult to find a lightning cable that is durable and will last a long time. I rated this cable a 4/5 stars because it’s the longest lightening cable I’ve had survive for me, but that was only 2 years. It has survived traveling the country and everyday use for the past 2 years. It’s a great value for a 4 star product. I would purchase this cable again.
Love this cord. It is my second one (my first one stopped working after three years) but they last considerably longer than the Apple cords that come with your phone.

I tend to go thru cords, I think because I often use the iPad while it’s plugged in, & eventually they bend near the connection & break.  I really like the substantial feel of this cord, & it’s been holding up just fine for over 6 months so far, lots of use. I have 3 for our various devices.  I would buy again.

Another cheaply constructed charging cable package that did not even last six months.  I think I have tried several different manufacturers from Amazon.  So far, everyone is striking out and batting zero.

Works well after quite a few months.  No visible wear and tear like saw with the Apple supplied cord.  Going to buy more.Sep 2019 Update:  have a couple of these that have been used every day.  Still working well.  Used as portable cables most of the time - holding up well.  Will get more.

Wish I could give it a zero! Had this cable for 2 mo. and it’s broken already. The lightning connection wobbles back and forth and it will no longer charge. It’s not like I was hard on it, it never left my bedside table where I plug my phone in every night. Thought by buying an Amazon Basic item it would have some standards for quality, but instead it’s like I opened my window and threw some money out on the street.

I like that this charging cable is very long because I am able to keep my phone plugged while I am using it in bed. It also has a thick nylon material that products the wires which makes it very durable. It is an essential product as I am constantly breaking my other charging cables. This has lasted for a very long time and I have yet to experience any issues with it.
So far cable works great! Cord has a quality feel to it like it will last for a while. I bought to replace a apple cable to charge my devices in my house. I have not yet used it in the car for audio.
It’s pretty and I love the color. I bought this so that I could lay in bed while charging and occasionally picking it up. It does the trick. I will probably but a back up!

I'm delighted to find a happy alternative to Apple's charger cables. My Apple cord had just died at 13 months old..... one month past the date that they will replace it.... the second one that I have needed to replace for my current iPhone 6. This AmazonBasics cable is much sturdier with a braided heavy cord, is 1/3 the price of Apple's at the same length, and the color is even pretty!

The price is what attracted me to this cable, and I am not disappointed. The rubber parts connecting the lightening and USB to the cable portion seem sturdier then the apple cables and the cable itself is heavily reinforced. The only issue I have is that it does not charge my phone as quickly as the apple cable, but for less then half the price, I can live with that.

Typical braided charging cord. Seems sturdy where the original ones like to break open near where the tip connects. It fits in the case opening so no issues there. And it charges fast with no errors about unsupported accessory like a lot of cheapo cords you find at the mall. Great product, great price, no regrets here.

This is a really good charging cable.  I feel like it charges faster than the iphone charger that came with my phone.  Also, the nylon cover is really durable.  The cables are for my boys who don't really take good care of the cables.  they're always leaving it on the floor, stepping on it, sitting on it, etc.  So this cable can more than take it.

Only lasted three months. We ordered two. Mine is doing okay still but my husband has a hard time charging his phone as it doesn’t always connect. Could be the difference of gentle vs heavier use. Either way I will be looking in to other chargers to try.
Super durable! I have 2 kittens that find it fun to chew on even though I tell them no-but the charger has no holes in it and still works flawlessly. Fast charges and the cord is super long.

At first, I thought this was an amazing purchase. I was actually happy with myself for coming across this cable, but after around 3 weeks of charging my phone, the cable died on me. (By the way, I’ve got an iPhone 8+ if any are wondering, so it’s not like it’s got “outdated” charging) And for me, that’s not acceptable, ESPECIALLY coming from Amazon Basics! So, all I’m saying is just go buy an apple cable, from Apple, not Amazon. Even go buy a cable from Walmart or something. Trust me, because I’ve got air pods and (-I got them with my phone, which was about 3 months ago) the charging cable has lasted me months longer.

Had this cord previously through a friend. It’s lasted me nearly two years before it started to fizzle out. This is definitely the brand I’ll be sticking with. I’ve tried others and they always seem to work at first and then they die! This cord is super reliable.

I've bought this cable twice now, and both times the cable lost connection and started to tear right below the plastic part of the lightning end of the cable.
