The first cable lasted a while, but in the winter my phone needs to be plugged in constantly or it dies, and the cable would get twisted and knotted while in my pocket because of how stiff it is. This inevitably would twist at the threads on the lightning end which broke the rubber and eventually the wires in the cable. It didnt even last 3 months. It was cheap, sure, but i think i'll invest in a threaded reinforced cable for the future.

I have been using mine for over a year and have had no issues or problems. I use it nightly to charge my iPhone and I bought my wife one that she uses the same.I bought the 6 foot one over a year ago and recently bought a 10 foot as well. This is one (on the right) is thinner and the head is smaller than the 10 foot one (on the left). (See picture)

Received my charge cable, but realized within the first few days that it wasn't charging my phone. The little lightning symbol would pop up which confused me, but no charging was taking place.These Amazon cables cost three times as much as the el cheapo ones I had previously, yet this one didn't work while the cheap ones all did, at least for a while. Not worth the price if they arrive defective like mine did, and you wonder what your money is going toward if not QC.

I purchased this lightning cable for iPad. The cable sits in same place. It’s been about a year and the cable is working off and on. I would not recommend buying this cable unless it’s for short term use.

We bought three 3’ and one 6’ cables. They seem to charge okay but we have only had them for a few weeks so I don’t know what their long term durability will be. Additionally, one of the three footers has developed a black, sticky residue on the lightning end.  See photos. Gets black marks all over everything. I complained to Amazon but received no response.
Shouldn’t I have also gotten the part that plugs into the wall ?? The cable itself is fine ...  but how am I supposed to charge my phone??Please let me know if I can order the second part too!! :-(
Only lighting cable that lasts!  These are higher priced than others, but well worth the extra money spent. Last thing anyone needs is a cheap cable break when you really need it.
Hands down best charging cord I’ve ever bought. Love the rubber accents and it is so durable. Worth every penny. No need to buy directly from Apple, in my opinion these are better.

Definitely glad I bought this charger. The material and flexibility have made this cord last longer than the typical charger cord material. I use this one in my car and it gets used and tossed around every day and so far, no sign of wearing down. Also, it's not super pink which I like ;) I love the rose gold color.
Works just as good as Apple Lighting cord at significantly less price.
So far so good.  Using them on my iPad and iPhone 6s.Each cord has a Velcro strap to keep it wrapped up.
This is SUCH good quality!  Great cord length,  super durable cable,  absolutely better than items costing way more.  I'm a huge fan of Amazon basics cables they do not disappoint
So, this charger is amazing! But it doesn’t last like super duper long. I’ve already had it a few years and it doesn’t charge as well as it did! BUT, it did last a good while!!! So, still amazing!

Update: stopped working after the return date. Don’t buy.Excellent product. I use it to reach the backseat for my son. No tears like the regular plastic cords. I definitely recommend to spend a bit more on this cord. It will save you money in the long run because it won’t need replaced as quickly.
I had the same type in the past and the cord ended up losing its form and the cable would  poke through. I am gonna try if Amazon brand works better. Will update.
This will not stay plugged into my phone. It falls out so my phone does not charge. Save your money and buy something else. I’ve tried two and both have the same problem.

I have had this cord since November of 2018 and its still going strong! Has shown no signs of fraying or splitting. Its my daily use cord for charging my phone at bedtime.No regrets and honestly, I can't believe it has lasted this long! Would buy again :)

I received dec 30 and it’s not working anymore. Won’t charge my phone.Another issue is that The casing right where the connector is, is too thick, and it won’t plug into my phone when my phone case is on. It always falls out. I don’t want to take on and off my case every time I charge my phone.

Nice cords but not durable. I’ve already had to replace them.You’ll lose the connection at the part that plugs into the phone, I’m not hard on the cables, just normal use of my phone while plugged up.

I love this long cord for charging my phone on my nightstand. That way I don’t have to unplug it if I want to use my phone in bed. It’s really durable and has held up really well. A lot of the other nonApple chargers I use crap out really fast, but so far so good on this one

Why do the mfgrs give us itty bitty cords for our devices? I feel like I have sit up against the wall to charge.This cord is great. I can’t guarantee it’s as fast as possible, but it’s fast enough for me.

UPDATE - 2 years later it’s still working with no issues...This charger is outstanding for the price tag. It's not a cheap and flimsy looking charger.  It has a very good high quality and it charges your phone quickly.  I have used it for about a month now and I ordered a second one.  I will not purchase another brand charger and will update if I have any issues.

I got this about 18 months ago and started having problems over 6 months ago.  The cable is visually perfect and has been plugged in by the couch it's whole life.  Sometimes it charges and sometimes it doesn't.  If you know it has stopped charging you can fiddle with it and usually get it going, but by the time you set your iPad down, it could stop again.  I think I'm going to try an Anker.

Bought in July of 2018. Has held up very well. Unfortunately I just got an iPhone 11 and it won’t charge the new phone. Will still keep for my iPad but for whatever reason it just will not charge my iPhone 11. Now on the hunt for a new 6 foot cord as using my phone while it’s charging just isn’t feasible with a 3 foot cord, especially while in bed.
I have two of these, use them fairly hard, and have had great success with both.  They have already outlasted every other lightning USB cable I’ve ever purchased except Apple’s.
This cord was absolutely terrible. It appeared to have a short, the charge kept cutting off and on. I held on to it until a found a better one, now this one is going in the garbage.

This is a wonderful cable. Right out of the box I could easily see and feel the difference in quality construction, compared with other nylon- reinforced braided cable I own (which were more expensive). The connectors attach firmly and the reinforced area where the lightning connector attaches to the cable looks to be very substantial and where my cables fail first. This is a very flexible cable that doesn’t tangle, twist or cause issues.I never get an error message on my screens about an “unsupported accessory”. Only time will tell, but my experience tells me this is a definite winner. An absolutely awesome cable at a great price. I am very satisfied.

I'm shocked that Amazon would put their name on this product.  One of the cables stopped working within days, the others degraded over a couple of months.  I should have sent them back.  Unless Amazon has done something to improve the poor quality of these cables you definitely want to go in another direction.

I have bought this charging cable in many colors. It works amazingly well. The cord is much more durable than my phone brand cord and has outlasted it. Would recommend to anyone needing a phone charger. I keep one in my purse, one in my car, and one at home and I couldn't be happier with them!

Holds up good but the wire seems to have something inside that makes it hold so I’m curious to see how it does overtime.  Eat way to describe it is like a copper wire yeah sure you can bend it but over time the points of friction will eventually breakUpdate; 2 weeks into it, it stopped working.

I have had this cord for almost 11 months and it has done me wonders. I have really bad luck with chargers and this is the longest one has worked for me. It’s really cute and has held up over a lot of travel and heavy use. It’s long enough for me to use while my phone is charging. Amazon did a good job. And my phone has never said this cord isn’t certified or that I can’t use it.
So far so good. I have bought others that had to be replaced within 60-90 days because they stopped charging. Ask me again how I liked this one in 3 months and we'll see how this one does. ;)

I figured I'd try this cable out as my apple cable had frayed beyond working and I wanted to try to see if I could replace my cord for less than the $20 an apple cable costs which seemed kind of expensive to me.  This one arrived and the first couple of days it did charge my phone but less than a week later I plugged my phone in and the only thing it did was hold my phone at 1 percent which was completely useless. I don't recommend you get this, it was a complete waste of money and left me completely infuriated!

I needed another cable at my computer. The old one had frayed badly. I'd previously bought 2 of the braided cables and found them to be sturdy and durable. I wanted something that will last a long time and I'm sure this will fit the bill. Works great and I like the cord that wraps around it so I can bind it to a shorter length.

Love this cord! I bought it because none of my furniture is comfortably near an outlet, and I use my phone for all kinds of things. This cord is long, very pretty, and durable. It's flexible without risk of breaking the wires within. I'll probably get the 12 foot cord next because this one is so awesome.

I never write reviews but this is probably the worst product I've ever purchased from Amazon. I purchased two of these cords and they both have the same issue. When plugged in, unless put in a certain way and then sat completely still, it will not engage to charge. If the phone is picked up while the charger is plugged in the charger falls out of the port. It seems like this charger was not made correctly and does not actually fit the phone's charging port.

I guess I forgot how short three inches was! This seems to be good quality. It feels heavy duty. It’s just really short. And I held it up to my Apple 3ft cord and it was even a little shorter than that. I would recommend it, just know it’s only 3 feet-ish and that is short ;)

Worked great for 6 months.  Now have to wiggle it in lightening port to get good enough connection to charge.  I recently replaced my phones lightening port and all my other charging cables work fine, so this confirms this Amazon cable is low quality.
It’s so nice to have 1) an extra long cord & 2) a cord that doesn’t split. I have a dozen charging blocks from other brands, but the cords always get thrown away from splitting by the input.
Considering how many lightening cords I’ve manage to break at the charging end over the years, this one has lasted longer than most, even though it has started to fray a bit.

So far charger works great for my iPhone 7plus and iPad which is one of the first editions with Retina display. I got the six ft cord but kinda wishing I went longer. Seems really durable compared to the flimsy Apple cords you get with your actual phone purchase. Hope it lasts!

I was hesitant to buy those cords but since the cord that comes with our phones doesn't last long, I needed something. I have had my 3 cords for over a year and all of them function properly. I'm amazed they've lasted longer than the one I got with my phone. The 6ft cords are long and necessary for wherever you are. I definitely recommend this cord.

It's a lightening cord, but I find it so attractive and more flexible than regular rubber-sheathed cords. Especially since one stays in my car all the time and is exposed to cold (Minnesota winters!). The rubber ones get so stiff in the cold and I worry it will crack.
Very impressed with this charger. It charges my phone very quickly, there’s been absolutely no fraying or damage, and I love that it’s long enough to reach across my entire bed.

This charger works seamlessly with my iPhone 6s and I’ve waited awhile to write my review so I’d have enough time to say it is holding up well. I take it everywhere with my battery pack, in my car and still no fraying or compatibility issues. Works better than the one that came with phone which has been broken since about 2 months after I got it.
Best charging cord ever!!  I use it every night (for months) and love the strength of it, the length of it and the texture.  Why aren't all charging cords made out of this material, I'll never know.

Very happy with this purchase. The Apple brand charging cables haven’t even lasted a full year before fraying and stopped working. I’ve had the nylon ones in the past and this one certainly doesn’t disappoint. Thrilled with the product!
cable works great and has held up very well so far (2-3 months--but tough usage due to travel).  Connectors fit snug but not too tight, and haven't had any issues.
I've had this for a while at work and it has not skipped a beat once despite all the twisting, bending, and folding it's been through.  Will buy again
So far these have outlasted the more expensive cables that we have tried. Very sturdy and great quality.

I got the gold to stand out in all of my white chargers. I was disappointed when it blended in so well. I knew that this was 3ft when I bought it but I was HIGHLY recommend anyone to buy at least a 6ft charger, especially if it is for a wall charger like mine is. It works perfectly though.

I love these I had one for three years and it finally gave out so I bought another. Pretty much any of the amazon basic stuff are great. It’s nice quality, the braided cord adds extra strength and the rubber around the base helps a lot. If you aren’t like me and use your phone in bed while charging you know that it bends and can ware down. But the rubber on there stops it! These last a long time and the length is nice I no longer have to use an extension cord just to charge my phone.

Bought for myself to have a lightening charger in another room for my IPad...took it almost 6 hours to charge...my orginal takes almost 3 hours and that is when it is down to 5 %..was going to return...6.99 to return...not worth it...into the garbage can..
It only worked a couple of times and after that nothing :/ not worth it. Wish chargers lasted longer then this one.

Well, I just reordered this product after 2 years of being connected to my phone while I scrolled before I fell asleep and after I woke up, living under my pillow all night, and being looped around a bedpost during the day. I’d say 2 years was a good life for pretty vigorous use. I like the nylon better for keeping it around my bed and 6ft. Seems to be just the right length.

I am interested in how long it will work, all cables have a set lifetime from normal wear and tear, usually fraying where the cable connects to the charging end into the phone so will keep you posted. Quickly recharges my tablets. Time will tell how durable it actually is.

I got two of these chargers at the end of March, it is now mid August and they both are done already. they randomly began to not stay connected to the phone. My phone would have to be at the right angle and be still while plugged in. then it got worse and randomly disconnect and not charge no matter how still the phone was, or what angle.
I've had this cord for a long time now, and have not destroyed it yet. I'm really hard on charging cords and this one wont die! I use the 3ft one in the car and a 6ft one at home

I have bought two of these cables in rose gold. It was a shot in the dark, and after many attempts we found these gems. these cables are nice and feel more robust then others on the market. I would love to purchases more. at the price point they're worth the purchases.

At first I was very pleased with this charging cord. It seemed durable and had a nice feel. The 6 foot length was perfect. However, the tip broke off soon after I opened the package while I was charging my iPad. The end was stuck in the charging port and I had to fish it out. Very unhappy with this product. I had much higher expectations especially considering the price. I never wrote a review on Amazon before but I felt I had to as a warning to everyone to not waste your time!
I’ve bought this exact cable several times and will always go back to it. I’ve never had one break or quit working. They’ve all been lost or I just wanted another extra.
The plug is too small, it literally just falls right out of my phone. You have to prop it carefully and not touch it for any charging to happen.
"This accessory may not be supported" message keeps coming up on our iPhone. Newer iPhone and this cable was ordered less than two months ago. If you want a good cable that will last, this is NOT it.

I've only been using this charger for about 2 weeks now, and it has been working perfectly. It charges my iPhone 7 and my husband's iPhone X without any issues. The cord seems durable and of good quality.

I bought this as a replacement so that we could charge my sons’ communication devices. It’s not even out of the box a month and i had to pull the lightning end out of the charging port with a pair of pliers because it fell apart when I tried to unplug it. I was really disappointed because the cost is way more than even the Apple chargers and I thought it would last because of the cable. Apparently I should have been worrying about whether it was going to fall apart instead. I’ll be sticking to Apple brand chargers from now on.

These cords are pretty decent. They seem to have held up well with regular use. I have not used braided cords much before this but will continue to after getting these. They just seem to be more durable in the long run.
Very sturdy and doesn’t get ragged. I’ve purchase several of these now and switched out all of our other ones we got with our phones and even given some as stocking stuffers!

I love this amazon basics charging cable. It comes with a little Velcro wrap to tie it up which is convenient for traveling. The cloth cable makes it harder to tangle and more durable. Definitely one of the best lightning charging cables.

These cables have been through the ringer and have yet to fail me. From the work truck to even being used on the four wheeler, they have performed great. I’ve lost some, and some have been robbed by friends, but I’ve not had one wear out on me yet.

I bought a few of these to have on hand as for some reason my iPhone and ipad chords get twisted so much that they end up fraying .. so I use these now and they last longer and have some on hand for spare
Really went down in quality.  They barely go a month before the iPhone says it’s not a supported accessory or I need to keep moving the charger around to get it to work

Seems to be well built and the connector reinforcement look robust. The proof will be in the durability, as it only been in service about two months. The primary user of this cable is notoriously hard on cables, so I'll try to update this review as when it's been in service longer.

I typically don't trust non apple products for charging my apple devices. I have seen issues where Non-Apple cables/connectors end up not working. I decided to try this one out because the price was good and I wanted a braided cable. The factory Apple cables always deteriorate and leave exposed wires over time. I love the quality of the cable. It feels very sturdy and I think it will hold up over time (at least longer than the apple cables). I haven't had a single issue with charging my iPhone 7. I will be buying more of these cables for all my electronics!
Stopped working about 30 days, right after the amazon allowed return period.... I can't return it nor warranty it.

Charges about as fast as my original Apple cable, which has been a problem in the past with cheap cables. The braided exterior and the rubber overlay where it meets the connectors are all sturdy, and the attached Velcro band is convenient for wrapping it up. I've had success with all the AmazonBasics cables I've tried, this one was no exception.

Great! I love the braided cord style. This thing has been with me to many places and has endures quite a roughing. I would absolutely purchase it again if need be, or suggest it to someone else. Works with Apple data transfer and lightning charging.

Works just as long as your typical power cords. I got about six months use out of it before going defective. I was very please with the cord and the length. I was also impress with amazon warranty replacement policy for the cord.

I have purchased 3 of these.  Durable, long, and come with a attached Velcro tie which is very convenient.  Plus I've a grey one which the rest of the family do not have.  Hence it does not disappear because it's readily recognizable.

I just bought a new cords for my phone because my kids keep losing them. I went with a cheaper brand this time and I'm so upset, i should have just reordered these. The new was I bought do not fast charge. These really worked and the fast charged.
Love these. Bought two to leave in the couch USB ports. They seem good quality and my phone charged up no problem. I would recommend them, and buy them again.

Recently bought this after the death of my last cord. It came quickly, and was undamaged. The cord seems durable so far and I've had no issues getting it to connect to my phone (iPhone 7+). Charges fully and charge lasts the normal length. With shipping I think I paid about what you would pay to go buy a plain cord in the store, but I'm hoping that the braiding and heavy rubber ends last longer than a generic cord.

I had these for a total of 3 months before they both stopped working. No, they did not fray, but they don't work either! I am now back to using my old, frayed charging cords (glad I saved them!) that still work after a couple of years. I have chargers all over the house & in my car, so it's not even like I use them all the time.
The phone end of this charger was about one million degrees last night when my wife went to unplug her phone.  I don't think this is supposed to happen.
Good affordable charger. Color is cute. Seems made well. Eldest is pretty hard on things but this seems like it will hold up as long as she doesnt lose it. Recommend

Not sure what all the bad reviews are for. Got it in August 2017 and it still works really well, has last longer than any one I've had from apple. No fraying and seems to be durable. Works fine with my Mac. Maybe 5% of the time I have to plug it back it to trigger my phone to charge, but that could be a phone issue.

I’ve been very happy with my previous Smazon Basics lightning cords but NEEDED this cute pink one! I expect it will wear as good or better then the other plastic 6’ cords (and much better than the original)
I bought 2 and the one I’ve  plugged in hardly charges and constantly reads from charging to not charging! This is junk! Not worth the price to send back- really dissatisfied!

Great cable. Paired it with an Anker USB outlet charger and it charged my iPhone 7plus very quickly. Was used as my bedside charger and didn't travel with it at all. I went ahead and got 6 foot Anker cables for my next ones because most of their products have been great to me. At the time of this purchase, I wanted a cheaper alternative and this worked out much better than other cables I have experienced from Amazon.

I carry power packs with me often and needed extra cords - these did not last long. It’s been less than four months and they are no longer working. The one in my room that I don’t move a lot, is fine,  but if you need to pack and take it with you, get a different one.

Braided or not, this cable stopped working after two years. No tear, it's just been plugged and charging my phone bedside. Just stopped working out of the blue. Not worth spending more on this cable as the standard white plastic one I purchased around the same time still works. I suspect programmed obsolescence. I'd rather be able to purchase a good quality cable and not add more waste to landfills, but Amazon does not seem to offer that type of product.
So far so good! the cord seems to hold up really well in the car with all that i have going in there. the charging seems to be normal compared to the apple brand charger. i like it! thank you

I should've trusted my gut when it came to braided nylon cable wires. This one I purchased, because it was an Amazon choice, however, it doesn't work. No charge at all on my iPhone & iPad mini. I really wouldn't recommend this.
Very long cord and a good charger. After a few months the end piece near the part goes into the phone started shearing and i ended up having to throw it away.

This is my 2nd Amazon Basics charger and I love it. It’s fast and durable. I bought this one for my car and it’s the right length for that purpose. The other one we have it 6ft for next to the bed and it is perfect for that spot.

Best lightning cable I've ever used. Belkin cables tend to give me issues, particularly with Apple Car Play. The AmazonBasics cable has no compatibility issues whatsoever and it's much cheaper than brand names.

I am enjoying Amazon’s basics nylon braided charging cord.  It’s very durable oh perfect length, it charges my iPhone very quickly. I don’t keep getting messages saying it’s in compatible, it works just perfectly thank you. It is well worth the money is that I spent and it was not expensive

I felt like I was splurging the first time I bought one of these cables, but I love it. I never have an issue charging or transferring data between my PC and Apple devices, and it shows no sign of wear after a year and a half.

My work life is a little hectic, constantly getting in and out of the car charging my work phone and then my personal phone. This cord has been a trooper, got stock on the door a few times, yanked out of the socket in a rush multiple times and its still kicking. It's lasted me well over a year, when other cords even apple cords have failed me.

My gf and I have bought 4+ of these cables over the past 2 years. They hold up better than the 10+ other cables we've tried - you know, the ones that only charge if you plug it in the right way after a couple months. If you need a 6FT cable that works with every iPhone update then this is the one to get. Spend the couple extra bucks and get yourself a quality cable. None of our cables have ever stopped working by the way!
These are fine if your needs are short lived - cheap, long, arrive fast. Don't expect them to last, however. Have several packs of these and other ultra cheap cables that does with a month or 2.

Love this! I have had it for a little over a year now and it charges my iPhone in the car very well. The cord has been very durable. I leave this in the car all day and it has worked well through cold and hot temperatures.

Lo compre como buck up por si llegara a tener una emergencia, y paradojicamente la tuve el mismo dia de comprarlo a consecuencia de la NO entrega de otra compra por parte de Amazon y esperando la llegada me robaron el cable orginal de Apple. Este, no tiene el agarre del original y se suelta a cada momento. Para un emegencia sirve, pero no es un buen producto comparado con el orginal. Si puedes, compra el original y no este.

Love the color, works properly. I’ve ordered these before and I lose them or dog eats them or someone borrows them so I think I’ve orders about 8 so far. I even keep one in a dirty mechanic shop and it’s dirty but works like a charm. Customer for life

This is my second time repurchasing this product. It works great. The only issue I previously had with it is that with time, the part where the cord bends, becomes so bent that it will not charge anymore. But my last one lasted about a year and then I repurchased, so not bad at all for the price.

My original apple USB to lightning cable for my phone broke. I'm got very tired of buying more apple products because of poor quality and short lifespan. I am very pleased to have the Nylon Braided Lightning cable for my phone and iPad. There are no signs of wear and tear. Very durable and a much better price than the apple products. Thank you Amazon for coming up with a better product with a reasonable price.

I can’t believe after only a few weeks, this thing failed to deliver a charge. Because it was so new, I immediately suspected my phone was malfunctioning, but after inserting another cord, the phone instantly began to charge. I was so sure I could depend on this one, but it’s the newest addition to my ever increasing junk cord collection.
They all stopped working in 2 months.. I can’t return them because the window for return is closed.. Don’t waste your hard earned money..
Charging Power - EXCELLENTCord Length - PERFECT

Great quality and always a good idea to have extra charging cables when you own apple products LOL.  Just be aware that this cable’s end is NOT the same size of the original Apple cable.  So if you have any waterproof case or robust aftermarket phone case IT WILL NOT FIT.

The cord works as promised.  If I had it to do over again, I would have ordered a longer length.  Totally my fault, but hopefully others will see this and decide accordingly.  In my opinion, a little extra cord is better than too little.

What else can I say? I purchased this item in mid November, and by late February it no longer functions. I  rarely used this cable, as it was a spare. I am very disappointed. I expected more from an Amazon Basics product.

I have been through many of the apple lightning cables.  After a while, the material begins to stretch, and eventually starts to flake off.  I bought this because I wanted a strong charging cable that would last a while.  So far so good.  Its a tough cable, that looks like it will go the distance.  I plan to replace all of my lightning cables with this one, as they wear out.
Good wire. I just wish a trillion dollar company made them as cheap as possible and made them recyclable.Other than that. Still a great wire. We only use amazon wires. Because they’re certified.

This works just as well as a standard apple charger. However, it feels more sturdy then the apple one. I love the color. However it did not work with my BF knock off Lifeproof case. So just be warned if you have a case with only a small opening on the bottom to charge, the plastic around the charger might prevent you from inserting it all the way. It plugs into the bottom of my Lifeproof case easily
i order these for several iphone models we own. The braided holds up well, i never get messages about the phone not liking the cable or charger, its the only kind i order.
Worked great for about 3 days and then stopped charging at all.  My phone would show the charging icon but wasn’t actually charging.  Tried getting it to work with no success.

I am very happy with this replacement for the original cable that came with my iPad. I had only just read about how the original cables had a history of fraying at a weak spot when I discovered that this had begun on mine. This braided cable appears to be better designed than the original.

Faulty intermittent lightning connection after 6 months of use in low stress environment.  Used an Apple connector and it charged fine. Thought this would be more durable as it is sheathed nylon. The connector itself is poor, however.

This choice is my go-to for a durable long, (and cute and colorful) iPhone charger! I love that it comes in shades to match your phone, and that it is braided, making it way more durable. I keep these chargers all around the house for comfort to use while charging. They're also great for the car to pass the device to someone in the back seat. These chargers are long lasting and I highly recommend them.
Cable became frayed after a month!It was only my night time Cabel!
These cords are great for the extended length and cheaper than the brand name ones. They hold up better than other low cost cords but they do wear down quicker.
Good replacement charging cable. Cannot compete against the original Apple cable, but much better and stronger than other 3rd party products.

Searched through my order history and came back two years later just to write this review. The cable is fantastic. It’s reinforced at both ends and has held strong since day one. I’ve treated the cable relatively well (mostly stays in my bedroom and coil it correctly when traveling). Bought one for my wife and she does not treat hers well, but hers just has a tiny amount of fraying on the nylon part. If this thing ever breaks, absolutely would order again.

I loved my first purchase so much so that I came back and ordered 2 more for others in the household.  It’s very durable.  We’ve had to replace 3 Apple chargers in less than a year due to the wires coming apart.  I think this one will last for many years.  Thank you for making this one so durable!!!!!!
The length is great, the first one I bought lasted about 6 months with heavy use. The next two I bought broke within 2 weeks. they look sturdy but do not like being flexed at all

Love these cords, super durable! I've stopped buying all others and have moved to these exclusively.  So far I haven't had to replace any of them and we are going on 5 months with the first set.  In a house with 3 kids who are constantly yanking on things, and a bunny who gnaws on everything (won't touch these because of the braiding and lack of rubber exterior), this is truly a miracle!
I used this charger for my phone and my ipad and now it won't charge anything! I loved it up until I was working a 12 hour shift and my phone died because the charger just stopped working!

After losing my original cord, I purchased this cord and have been extremely impressed with the quality. The only downside is that the cord is 6ft long which is extremely useful, but it is a bit awkward to casually carry around in a pocket for example.  Five stars ;)
This is an excellent product. I bought it to use in my new Audi Q5 for Apple car play.It’s the perfect length and it doesn’t get hot like other ones that I’ve used.
I chosed a grey color. because it won't get dirty easy.my original apple charging cord has been broken .actually it's been chewed by my puppy.

These cables set the standard.Second time we’ve purchased these cables, not because the first ones were broke but everyone in the family has one now. I have two of the 6’ ones and several 3’ the whole family enjoys them

Until 24 May 2018, I loved this cable; however, it quit working.  It no longer charges my phone and constantly makes that "beep-I'm plugged in" sound.  I'm using it at my bedside to charge my phone overnight, so the phone is resting on my night table.Pros:
Got extremely hot very quickly. If you buy this cord test it right away. I've had it in a drawer for several months until I needed one. Too late to send back.

The power cord works well with the fast charger and has a firm connection with our samsung galaxy phones.  The only issue I had was that it gets tangled so easily.  I am sure that is strictly to the length.
Another great charger from AmazonBasics. Bought this set due to how many we needed around the house (there are 7 of us). They did not disappoint.

I bought this charger bc the plastic ones seem to always bend and rack by the end.  This cord is sturdy, but comes unplugged from the phone easily. I don’t know if it’s bc the cord is too strong but you definitely have to watch out for that.

The amazon basics line is SO beyond actual apple chargers quality it should be a crime. I will never use an actual apple charger again! I also am obsessed with the 6ft cord, makes charging my phone but still lounging around in the evenings so much easier ;)
I use this in the car and at my desk.  The cord is a little longer than necessary on my desk but perfect in the car.  It lasts longer than any other charging cord I've purchased.

I have yet to find one of these types of cords that works 100% of the time great material holds up well but when charging sometimes it won’t let your phone work sometimes you have to unplug an plug back in to get it working and I only have been using for a month it’s brand new stays on the kitchen counter top for my wife an I to use. You get what you pay for I guess don’t waste your money on this cord
Not durable and quit working less than a month after having it! Item may be cheap and affordable to replace. But in the long run it’s cheaper to buy a namebrand more durable cord and reliable cord!

she loves to eat cords, especially important ones. This nylon one is far more durable, and she can't really seem to get through. At least, not quickly. I am able to catch her and stop her before it is destroyed forever.

This cord is stronger than the thin cords that come with phones and short out. It charges well and should last longer. I feel more secure with this cord. In spite of careful handling, the thin cords can bend and short out. This cord is made well and is worth the purchase.

Actually, so far I would give this a 5-star rating. However, I've only had it a few weeks so haven't been able to evaluate durability. I'll come back later and update.It's very sturdy. The lightning adapter head is small enough to fit in my Lifeproof Fre case hatch. So far, very pleased.
These braided cord are great for my kids' devices, since they don't tend to take good care of things like this. The cords are very flexible and seem to hold up well to the treatment of two tweens!

I still have yet to be disappointed in Amazon basic products. Cutest pink color (and surprisingly doesn't get dirty very easily) that I am proud to own.  I have been using this for a while now in the car, but haven't stopped charging like the other cheap cables out there.

I have 2 teenagers at home that can be hard on chargers.  We have been through many types of charging cords but these have outlasted them all and they are cheaper than most.  I’ve recommended them to all of my friends

Giving 4 stars based on my initial thoughts. I can’t give an honest review after only having this cord for one day. Bought to leave at the office so I don’t have to keep taking one back and forth from home. Quality feels good, looks nice, & charges properly. Hopefully it’s still working 3 months from now - as I read some not so good reviews.
Only worked for about 2-3 weeks! Now it doesn’t charge my phone. Waste of money and should’ve just bought an original apple charger (which I will have to now).

Just got my charger in the mail yesterday. I ordered Rose Gold for myself and Dark Grey for my husband. We both used them for the first time last night to charge our phones overnight. They work great, no complaints. Charges fast too, was using my phone a little while charging. Also the colors are exactly like in the advertised pictures. I also love the length, don't have to be right next to outlet if you want to use your phone!!

This cord does a great job. The length and durability of it is great. It does the job I need it to do. This is not my first one of these. In a house of 6 people with all Apple products, these have become very handy.

This item was backordered when I purchased it back in early March 2017. I am just receiving it in May 2017, lol. Let me tell you this thing is sturdy and much stronger than the regular Amazon Basic iPhone cord which usualy crap out within a year. Of course time will tell on this one but it seems so much stronger!
Bought this cord May 26 2020, it is now July 15, 2020 and is no longer working. I can no longer return the charger either. Disappointed with this purchase.

This is a great cord. From continual use (a lot of which was a 6 year old) the Apple lightning cable broke at the connection to the lightning plug end.  We've been using this cable for about 5 months now and it's showing no signs of wear yet.  The cable is also less likely to get tangled up when throwing it in a bag for transport.  Just grab it, give it a little shake and it lays right out.

I've only had this cable about 2 months so far, but it's working well, and it sometimes gets run over by a wheeled cart (accidentally).  Many cables don't fare well in this situation, but no issues with this one so far.
So far, so good but eventually these always break or stop working.  Hopefully, that will not happen, but so far, it's just fine.

Honestly I can’t remember when I bought this but I have used it everyday since. It is the best charger I’ve ever owned. Really durable and long enough so I can charge my phone while using it. Perfect, better than I expected.
It is definitely “sturdy”,  rather thick actually.  So far does a good job.  I have not had it long enough to assess durability.
Still works great! Which means a lot from me since I always use the Apple products- I never get the off brand but I’m pleasantly surprised with this.
Prefer these over the regular iPhone cord, long lasting and hardly get tangled. I've had a red one for a bit over a year now & the plastic is barely beginning to show wear.
Great quality. We like the length and the material on the cord.
I have this charger in my kitchen, every time my phone needs charging I just plug it in no problem. I really like this charger.

My wife has a history of tearing up charging cords through neglect.  This cord is reenforced with its braided cord and connector ends.  So far they have lasted longer than the cord supplied with the device.  I've bought several Amazon Basic cords recently and have been pleased with my purchases
Cord feels strong and seems to be cased in great material.Length is great and doesn't feel flimsy or cheap.

These USB chargers originally worked as described although they are not fast chargers so it took a considerable amount of  time to charge my IPad. The problem started a few months afterwards. They stopped charging my devices. I would get an error message saying it was not supported. I don’t know if after iOS updates the chargers no longer work or if it’s something else but after 2 1/2 months I had to replace them. Even though they were in pristine condition.

The only con is that it fits into my USB adapters so loosely that it falls out.  The previous model of Amazon Basics cord was perfect, and I’d replace this one with one of those if they become available again.

It is an Iphone cord and seems sturdy enough. It has plenty of length and came with a little velcro like strip attached to wrap it up easily. However, I would not classify this as "rose gold"  It is definitely just light pink. There is no gold tone to it whatsoever.
Awesome charging cord that survives the occasional accidental being stepped on. Very durable and reliable. Charges very quickly and length option is great

Have purchased 5+ of these over the last couple of years for my family.  We have been pleased and cant beat the price and convenience.  Generally they have held up well for at least a year which is all I ask of something at this price and with our heavy usage.  When they have stopped working <1 year the return/replacement from amazon was easy and efficient.  Recommend without reservation.

This cord is way better than the one that comes with your Apple product. It’s nice and long so you don’t have to sit right next to the outlet while charging. Perfect for laying in bed watching Netflix while your phone charges. I liked the product so much I bought one for my mom and she loves it!

This product worked well for about 14 months. Now it functions intermittently and has become practically useless. I believe there were various warranties pointing to it lasting many years. However, after a number of months amazon stops honoring these warranties. This is an oversight in amazons service and credibility. Amazon ought to honor the multi-year warrant they alluded to.

Just like many other shoppers noted, after some time the cable stops being recognized by the phone  with a note "Accessory not supported." At that point, the charging stops. It also happens that the charging will start and stop every minute or so, making your phone vibrate like crazy. Honestly, don't know what to do with it now but it is better than no cable.

These iPhone cords are great quality especially for the price of the product. I love everything we’ve received that has been Amazon Basics brand. These cords hold up for a long time and are delivered right to your doorstep.

I’ve only been using it for just over a month and it’s completely crapped out. When you move your phone, it’s keeps reconnection to charge repeatedly. So you always hear the ping of it reconnecting to charge throughout the night. I’m severely disappointed.

I really like these cords. So far, they’ve been the best ones I’ve found for my phone. The first one I bought lasted over a year before needing to be replaced. I also like that they are braided and don’t fray or crack like the ones that come with the phones.

Cord works Great, not like other knock off brands. I've purchases several different brands of lighting cables. Most of them work well for the price and some not so well. However this one I do not have any problems with and is working great. No lost connection issues and it appears very well constructed. I will buy a few more of them.
The cord worked great for about 18 months. The cord isn’t charging anymore. I have been very careful with it. No cuts, bends or abrasions noticed. The window for replacement has closed.
Phone doesn’t recognize these

Great quality charging cable. Definitely one of the strongest and most durable I’ve purchased yet. You can feel the quality just off the initial impression. Used on a couple trips so far and the only downside is the length, but I have other shorter cables that work just fine when this is too much. A must-have!

I was having a hard time with my three OEM Apple charging cables. This cable's quality is way better than even those OEM cables. It works perfectly as a charging cable as well as a sync cable that works perfectly with my iMac. Very much recommended, specially at the great "amazon basics" price!
Great length for plugging my phone in to charge using an outlet that is behind my desk. The color is very pretty and great for distinguishing my cord from other people who use the same space.
I bought this with a mounted phone holder in my car. The cord is durable and just the right length. Charge time is the same in my car as in a house socket. Love the color!
I’ve been using this cord for 2 years or so now. Still use it everyday. No issues ever and it’s lasted through my roughness. Should’ve gotten a 3 pack lol
This is a good basic charging cable.  No extra bells or whistles, and will probably last longer than the apple cable it is replacing.
Granted, I had the cable for 2 years before it stopped working, but I purchased this one because the "nylon braided" suggested it was better than one of the cheaper types.

I bought this after I used my boyfriend's amazon basics charger because it charged crazy fast. However, I'm noticing mine charges fairly average like any other charger. It's not a big deal cause it's average but I was hoping it'd be fast. Regardless, the durability is really nice cause my chargers are always breaking.

Best cable in the market! Very strong and thick material. Has this nice rubber part by the ends of the cords where it usually shorts out. Had the cable for months now and works just fine. Not to mention it also comes with a warranty. Definitely better than any aftermarket chargers, especially the original apple.

One of the pins burnt after about 8 months of use, making the charger effective only on one side, and some of the time. Compared to how long these last compared to OEM Apple cords though (literally weeks), investing in this charger is a great choice, and I'm glad that Amazon added nylon-braided as an option.

Not bad. 2/3 were broken within a couple months. It took me years of breaking aftermarket cables to realize you just spend the $20 on the Apple one and it lasts forever. The plastic degrades and falls off before they stop working.
This is the second one I’ve bought. The charge is very fast and the long length works well for me. Plus ... my happy color.

Somehow my Apple cord split so I needed a new one.  Saw this braided one and purchased it.  Great quality!  Bought the matching plug-in as well.  All set for another 5 years!  Certainly would recommend this cord to all apple users.
This is the perfect length, needed one that was a little longer than other charging cords.  It being pink made it the perfect choice.

I’m pretty rough with my charging cables. I move it around a lot and snake it around furniture. It’s still going strong with no signs of stopping. I also like the braided look of the cord and the Velcro to secure the cable when you wind it up.

I really love these, and they are so worth it. The Apple ones just disintegrate. I have had a charger next to a rolling office chair for years, and the braided gray one is the only really invincible one.
this product works maybe 50% of the time. apple products frequently report the product is not supported and charging stops.

So I'm a AmazonBasics fan boy I'm waiting for them to make toilet paper so I can buy that too. I love this cable. Very sturdy, durable and works great! I haven't had any charging issues with them at all!

This works perfectly with my iPhone.  I had this length of cable that I bought from the Apple store, but after a year it is getting pretty bent where it plugs into my phone.  I knew I would need a new cord soon, so bought the gold one and some silver ones for stocking stuffers this Christmas.  Everyone loves them. I would definitely buy them again.
Yes, I'm very please of this product it charge my iPhone 6 so fast it's better then the original from apple. my wife started using it and she loves it. I'm going to purchase another one for me.

I bought this because I wanted a longer, more durable charger than my regular apple cord. I bought this charger a few weeks ago and it's already quit on me. It charges off and on repeatedly over the course of a minute and then stops. It also told me the accessory was not supported twice.. I'm not happy. Waste of money.

Definitely always going to go with the cloth covered cords. Way better then the kind that comes with the phone. No problems with breaking seals or wires sticking out. Last long time best charger ive had. I now have two one for my room and for the car.

Just had a couple of cords go bad. The repeating issue I have is connection where cord goes into plug bending over time while using the device plugged in to charge.  The bending over time ruins cord ability to charge even with braided cords.  This cord has a rubber sleeve at the spot where this problem occurs with cheaper cords.  I have not had it for years but hopefully this will solve the problem.
Long enough for what I need and super durable! I’ve had it for awhile and so far it has held up! Much better quality than an apple charger

We all know Apple cords tend to wear out faster than we would like. This was a good replacement for the original. It’s very flexible and durable. The braided cord bends, wraps, and extends as expected. The length is perfect. It is longer than the standard length our devices come with. It also comes with a Velcro cable tie so you can wrap it up nicely and take it on the go.

40% of the time my iPhone says “unsupported accessory”. I have to unplug and turn the lightning connector over 180 digress to get it to work. Not a deal breaker but I can tell it’s not a real Apple product. Although if it was it might be easier to break or cost twice as much

So the charger definitely was a charcoal color i like to wait a while after using a product but it definitely works my only issue was that the charger wasn't the length we ordered, its more like 3ft cord which is a big disappointment.

Great cable. Love the champagne color and the cord has been very durable so far. I put my cables through the ringer it seems and this one seems to be one that will hold up very well. This is the first braided cable I have tried and as of now, I would get more if/when I need them.

This is the perfect length for car charging, the cord isn't extremely long and dragging on the floor but it also isn't extremely short - it still reaches to the back seat. The pink color is really cute and the nylon makes it really durable, I don't have to worry about the wires popping out like they did on my original iPhone cord.

I can honestly say this charger was at least slightly more durable than a glass egg. Other chargers I’ve bought from Amazon Basics have also superheated after a few months of use so now I can start fires whenever I go! Definitely bring this camping with you. Another bonus is that it produces enough heat for me to brand myself. How else were other people supposed to know that I belong to Amazon?

My mom is still using it, so it must be pretty good quality. I like the braiding and stiffness of the cord. And I got a pretty long one so my mom can use her phone a little bit more freely while charging when laying down.
Works just as to be expected. Nice quality cord and very durable. It is well made and has been working with no problems for me. Good buy
This product is well made and love the six foot length have bought three so far and are perfect when you need something extra when you have limited places too plug in.
stopped working. I purchase a lot of amazon made items and this was a disappointment
This chord is way better than the ones I got from Apple. I have not noticed any charging speed difference. The chord is much more convenient and durable. Highly recommended

This is amazing quality.  I have been using it every single day and it works perfectly for my iPhone 6 Plus.  The charging cord that came with the phone was beginning to fray at the connection where you hook it to the phone.  This charging cord is so much stronger.  I think this braided cord will last a long time and I also like how it is longer than the original cord.  I would highly recommend this.

This is the absolute worst charging cable I have ever used.  It does not stay in, no matter how hard I try.  I have to sit with it in my hand and even then it disconnects.  You can put your phone down, charging, and come back in a minute to find the connection has failed.  Avoid this at all costs.

Worked w my older iPhone 6 Plus for about 3-4 mos. after that - no go. My new iPhone 8 Plus is kinda iffy about it - some days it charges some days it flags it as a non apple product and still charges but some days it’s like nope..: not happening
Love this charger. This will last a lot longer than the vinyl ones.
Bought this style as previous cables were not durable. Also this cable is longer than normal which i like. However, this cable tends to kink up when you roll it up and then try to extend it out.

This is the only OEM charger I’ve had for over 4 months that has kept working. Love the reinforced neck because it really makes a difference! Have tossed at least 4 from other brands and keep coming back to Amazon Basics!

I bought this cable to replace my Apple power cord that my toddler destroyed. Why do kids love to chew on these things?I like the extra long cable and how tough it feels. No babies are going to be able to tear this one apart. My phone also seems to charge a bit faster with this cord, but that might just be because there aren’t any teeth marks on it (yet).
This is a great product I would highly recommend it for anyone who’s looking for a sturdy cord. I wish it was a little bit longer but it’s the standard length.

I bought this piece of crap on August 24th. A few weeks ago I noticed it would charge right away and I would need to unplug and plug it back in. Today it’s October 1st and it just stoped working. I used this as a bed side charger, I never move it. It has absolute zero durability. Save your money!!!

I bought this because the charging cable that came with my iPhone had become worn at certain places where it was asked to bend due to being strung up over the edge of my table. In fact, the plastic sheath had begun to fray away, exposing the wires inside. In contrast, this replacement cable's braided sheath is a bit more flexible (and pleasant to the touch too, which isn't nothing). After several months of use, I'm very happy with this choice of cable.
I prefer the chargers that are wrapped in nylon like this one. I found them less prone to breaking or getting twisted. They seem to be a less susceptible to fraying as well.

I bought this cord in March 2018.  It looks really nice with the gray braided cord.  Probably within 6 months it began to work VERY intermittently, with the charge turning on and off, on and off.  I thought this might eventually charge it anyway, but there's no way to trust it overnight and at times I've woken up with a dead phone.  I used to be able to unplug & replug and I would somehow get it right, but that's hard to do now, just 10 months after purchase.  I will say, I bought one for my mom and hers still works great.  But I'm disappointed with mine.
This cord is great. My Iphone charges so much faster w/this cord as opposed to others I have tried. Bought 3 more. Great product!!!
Love this charger and have bought several for different locations and backups. They last much longer than the standard cords and feel better quality, at a cheaper price
I have had this cord for 14 months and it is still working.  That's more than I can say for the official Apple product.

I've been waiting for amazon to create a sturdy power cord - the head does not become frayed like it's predecessor. Great product and excellent value. Have never had an issue with my iPhone rejecting the power supply.

This cable will not stay in my iPhone, while a "genuine" Apple cable and other brands stay in with no issues.  I assume it works OK, but I simply can't risk putting my phone on charge at night only to have the charger slip out enough to not charge my phone.
Looks like the photo.  Might be a bit long to be considered handy but I got it to reach an outlet that is a little far from my dual recliner.  It is super sturdy so far and I recommend it.

I bought this charger in September 2017 and it just now stopped working (July 2019) almost a whole 2 years later, so I am very impressed and satisfied with this product. The nylon certainly adds an extra layer of protection and prevents it from tearing and coming undone like the apple cords. Even though it stopped working it still looks good, it is not torn anywhere. It most likely stopped working due to my own personal neglect. I would highly recommend I am going to order another one myself !

I purchased this back in May 2018 and it was fine until about a month ago when it started to fray. Now wires are hanging out really badly so I have to toss it. It sits in one spot and I never pull on it or anything so I didn't expect to have to buy another one in less than a year. Total trash.
The first time I bought it it lasted me years! The second time it only lasted about 2 months. I don’t know if I should try it again.
Wonderful product. Durable, long enough for any plug and charges really fast. I used as my main charging cord for my car and after more than a year works good.

I’ve kept this cord plugged in next to the couch which is great when I’m being a couch potato and my phone is dying. The length is an absolute must for this reason. Plus it’s a pretty pink! No issues with use, always charges quickly.

First one worked for a few weeks. Replacement was fast, free, and easy. Replacement did not work. I purchased it along with the 4” cord. This did not work. Both were just out of the boxes  Will not purchase this brand again.
Never had any issues and I’ve had one for over a year now. Bought one for my friend since everyone could use a nice long charging cord. Highly recommend!
This cord is WAY better than the belkin cord I bought. This one is cheaper but this one doesn’t bend back like other one.
I love these cords, hope they keep making this color, we each have different colors in this house, that way we know who's is who's
Got in January and already it is working on and off 😫😫😫 epic fail. Have to hold at angle to charge. Should have just invested in a genuine Apple  Disappointed because I love to support amazon basics

my cord only lasted 3 months until it broke. I will be contacting about the year warranty and hopefully getting a new one sent. This cord only stays at home and is never used for traveling so I'm not sure why the cord has broken so quickly.

Great charger.  I have purchased so many chargers that work for about 2 weeks and then it says it's not compatible with my phone and then will no longer work.  AmazonBasics never have that problem.  Great product.  I intend to buy more!

I bought the 6 ft cord so my phone could reach my bed while charging. The cable has lasted me a long time now and still hasn't started to rip or anything. Nice length for reaching my bed. Phone charges well. Overall, very reliable. Unfortunately, my wife has now claimed it as her cable haha

Better than Apple’s, infinitely more sturdy, and the length is heavenly. Power is the same as Apple’s, and I have never received the message, “This product is not compatible...” that I receive using chargers from dollar stores. Worth the money.
The cord seemed high quality when I purchased it. I bought three and two of the three lasted less than a week. There was absolutely no wear and tear, they just don’t work. Very disappointed!

I bought one so when I’m in bed, I can roll over away from my night stand and still have plenty of cord length. I then bought a 2nd one to keep in my travel bag and I’m soon getting a 3rd one to keep at my office.

I've bought these cables brand new before and they work great. This time around, I thought I would save a couple of dollars by ordering a refurbished one. It's been less than two months of me using the charger at work and now it randomly stops working, usually several times a day, while my iPhone gives the error message that the accessory may not be supported. Unplugging it and trying again usually works, but it is still a nuisance and a disappointment. Definitely pay the few extra dollars to get the brand new ones.
Long wire, perfect for my nightstand, can reach the other end of the bed no problem. Really high quality, been using it for months now and there are basically no signs of wear.

I have only one issue with this cable - EVERYONE wants to charge their phones with it because its so fast!  Love it.  I was a bit skeptical because I saw so many complaints about it working for only a few weeks.  Well it's been a few months now and still going strong.  I especially like that the cable is so long and I can charge and use my phone at the same time.

Bought this for my wife’s car. It’s held up better than any android cable and definitely better than the factory lightning cable that came with our phones and IPads. We can reach every outlet with ease and zero charging delays
Excellent quality cable.I particularly like the rubberized joints at the connectors.
This charging cord is awesome. Great length. More durable than the plastic coated kid. This is my second one I got. I’ll take it to work.

The cord is adequate however I don't believe it charges fast enough so I don't know if it's the cable itself or if it's just my phone my phone is brand new so I don't believe it's the phone itself I just don't know that it charges quickly it takes forever to charge

I don’t know what the cause is but because this cable has metal ends, it gets very hot.  Eventually the phone recognizes it getting hot and stops the charge and showing a message that it is not compatible with the charging accessory.  I don’t recommend, especially for use in a car where the temperatures are already hot.
I've put this cable through hard used for the last few months. The braided cable still looks like new. The connectors are great.Pretty much a perfect cable.

This cable was great at first, charged well! But after about 4 months the cable would lag on my phone and barely charged. My charging notifications would go on, then off, causing some annoyance. Better off buying a mac charger. lel.
Better than OEM.  It’s durable and attractive.  Like all Amazon Basics I’ve purchased,  it’s top quality at a good price.

What seemed to be a good product sold by Amazon turns out to not last more than 3 months with proper care. All cables have slowly began to not charge my family iPhones. We noticed that the plug that connects into the iPhone is very weak and will easily bend/break if you leave the cord hanging and the weight of the cable relies on the plug. You can then feel the plug moving thus not charging the phone! Just really bad.. it has happened on all the cord lengths so now we don’t know if it’s just cheaply produced or the actual weight of the cord causing this issue.

What’s wrong with these? NOTHING! The only bad thing I can say is that I always lose them so I have to buy them again! These are sturdy, don’t seem to get fragile like the original cords that come with our phones!
Loved it. Until I didn’t. This may be more an Apple playing Apple tricks than an Amazon issue but still, accessory doesn’t work.

Love the long length and the material of the cord. I feel like you can bend it and twist it and the coating won’t break like the normal iPhone charging cords! I will not go back to the original cords after using this kind!

This product was great for the first few uses, the length of the cord is great if your outlet is just out of a standard lightning cables reach. The reason it gets one star is because after a while this product seemed to have damaged my charging port, making all charging cables fall off if not completely still, it also doesn’t charge as fast as a lightning cable.
Don't buy this. It's garbage. We use this for our bed side and it stays there and it stopped working after a few weeks.

Update: Less than four months and there is already a short in the wire! Dropping my review down to two stars!Very sturdy. The one that came with my iPhone split at the plug. Best part... the rose gold matches my phone!!! 👍🏻
