This one lasted me about 9 months before pooping out on me and doing that thing where it only charges if you hold it in a certain position. I think that lifespan is great considering the price and the fact that I constantly charge my phone while using it (which I’ve heard really kills a charger). Will be ordering this one again!
Half of the cables in the package did not work.  Fail to charge, connection on failed units cuts out or won’t power device at all.

Although I just received the charger, I find that it has worked for me now. It charges my phone the same speed as the packaged iPhone charger and the durable cord seems like it will stand the test of time. I bought the pink color and it’s very prett.

The Amazon Basics cable works well and works all the time.  It doesn't require the frequent jiggling of the connector to the device, etc., of the generic brands.  There isn't a large offering of colors, but the quality is what counts; and, that's definitely what you get.
Still doesn’t do anything but charge my phone. I figured amazon chargers would maybe do dishes or laundry by now they are so smart but just still only seem to charge phone.

Works as stated, I didn’t notice plug in was not included but I seem to have extras so not an issue.  The one I’m replacing came with my phone and had popped/sparked right away unsure if was the cord or cable but as stated no issue with this manufacturer
I needed a charging cord longer then 3 feet and this cord (6 feet) works great. Timely delivery and quality product.
It’s a lot better than the Apple cord that comes with the Apple products. The length is good. One for the living room one for the bedroom one for the car and I gave one away
The cord is sturdy and I've owned previous Amazon chargers so they're all great. I'm not so sure on the charging power though but I also don't know if it's because I mostly use it to charge my iPad.
Works well, no fraying after more than year of use!  Great length for traveling if outlets are far from bed.
Can’t speak to the how long it will last, but it charges well and the braided part seems to make it more durable.
I’ve had other chats he’s before. This works super fast and the cable is durable. Couldn’t be happier. Oh and it’s pretty darn affordable
I don't know how many USB cables I've gone through, a lot. This one is a nylon braided and I am confident will last a lot longer. Great price and of course super fast shipping.
this is my second charger in this quarantine it is not the same like the previous one , l just east my money again it is not working it has not been a week since I bought it ,

I'm really impressed with this charging cable.  I'm very happy with the extra rubber between the cable and the connector because this is where all my other chargers have fallen apart.  Bonus- the rose gold color is really pretty.
I have had this for a few months now and am very happy with it so far, it chargers my phone, is the perfect length and love the color.  I would definitely purchase another one in the future.
Lovely light pink color for those of you who want something that sets you apart in case anybody tries to steal your cord.

This was the best charger that I have ever bought!! I plan on buying more in the future because my husband always wants to use mine - it charges quickly but my favorite part of this design is the rubber that is on the areas that typically bend for an apple charger. It keeps the cord from bending and overall the cord just feels well made. As long as I have an iPhone this will be my go to charger.
Long length, great color and texture. it's held up to all kinds of abuse so far and no problems. Much better than others on the market.
Nice cable, it is really long.  It is the first charging cable I have had that I don't worry about finding a place to charge your iPhone.  Great for charging i your car / truck.
They do not work again, they worked fine for about a month and then they just stopped. Phone just dings every time you plug it in.
Love long cords and this is definitely long enough to reach anywhere. The cord is wrapped so it makes it super sturdy as well.

I always buy these because I love the length! I can actually be on my phone in bed while my phone is charging! The nylon cord is durable and I haven’t had any tearing issues with this one like I have with other brands in the past!

This is my second time buying this cord (my first one was chewed by my rabbit). It has great durability except against rabbits. The rose gold color is cute & it’s a great length. Charges my phone quick and seems to last unlike a lot of other cords.
What a waste of money for a product that does not work.  Better spend more money for an item that will work, than on item that will ship, not work and then you have to waste time shipping it back.

Ordered this on August 12, 2018. As of today, September 10, 2018, the item is no longer functioning properly and makes my phone continually waver between charging and not charging.The resulting charging noise every 3-5 seconds makes it unusable.

This cord is nice and we had no problems with it until about a year of use. This is the 4th one that the phone just quits recognizing as a charger. I’m guessing it has to do with the electrodes on the end. There are no other signs of wear.
Good it does the job.UPGRADE

We've been using these cords for coming up on a year now and have had no issues at all with them.  They are doing exactly what I'd hope they'd do.  One of them was accidentally dragged outside of a car for a few blocks and still worked.

I was excited when I received this product. The price was great. The material felt very durable and it was extra long. After initial use I began to get frustrated. I think due to the length and weight it disconnects from my phone sometimes at night when I place my phone on my night stand.
It has stopped charging and is being sensitive with the position of the cord and will stop and start charging. Wish I could get a replacement...

Has held up as well, or better, than Apple’s own charging cables. The best I’ve had so far: four months in, not only does they still charge, but devices are usable while plugged in - something that’s nearly impossible with most cables of this age.  I use it overnight, every night (and more), and it’s a peach!  As an Apple devotee for about a decade, I’m impressed.

Once my original Apple chargers go bad, I turn to these. They’re great quality, great length, great charging power. Where the fall short is after some time, it doesn’t stop working but stops working at certain angles. This is very common among chargers, but for the price, the ease of mind that it’s not bad for your phone and the quality, you can’t beat it.
I have purchased many charging cords for my iPhone and these have been the best by far and lasted the longest

I went through about 3 braided chargers including an Anker charger. This on has lasted over a year and still works like new. 1. Apple products have to have a certified cable (cause it’s apple and you have to pay more for everything). 2. Amazon Basics is the best one and by no means the most expensive.

LOVE. I love the length of the cord and I love the heavy duty quality of the nylon. It's important for me because I definitely am guilty of propping the phone up (so that the cord bends a bit) while I'm watching a video or reading a book. This seems like it will stand up to some bending and twisting where my other cords have quickly split and exposed the inside wiring.
I’ve purchased 3 of these - one in June ‘18, one in Aug ‘18 and one Feb ‘19.  All still work and are charging as they should be.  Need to replace another apple cord soon and will go with this again.

I have gone through my fair share of chargers. After a year or so chargers usually break or only work at certain angles. Ever since I changed to this brand I have had no trouble. This is super durable and lasts!

I bought a 2-pack of these about 6 weeks ago.  1 of them has already gone bad.  It simply won't charge my iPhone and/or iPad.  Highly disappointed in this product.  Both cords have been handled smoothly and have been kept inside.  I am not sure why one of them just stopped working.  I would not recommend these to friends or family.

I recently ordered  handful of chargers (20) for work, immediately checked the box and noticed  12 chargers were in the box. This is completely unacceptable, please do inventory on this product if you decide to order. Will take further action.

I bought this cord Sept/2017. 22 months later it’s just started to malfunction. I am very happy with my purchase from before. It’s disheartening to see so many recent bad reviews. I was thinking of buying a new one. I’ll think about it some more and update my review once I do make a decision. I only wish the cord was longer 10ft or so. It’s just recently started to not charge anymore that i have to take out the lightning cable and turn it a round.

Absolutely amazing! I’ve bought hundreds (exaggeration) of lightning cables from the official apple ones to cheap knockoffs and this is by far the best one.It looks sleek and and has a small velcro slip to keep it tidy and rolled when using it in small distances but extends when using for long distances.
I would highly recommend this chord, is perfect for your nights stand or when traveling where the plugs in the hotel might be a bit far.

great improvement to their non braided cables.  My old amazon cables finally started coming apart from where the lightening and cable connect.  This nylon braided cord feels so much more sturdy.  I expect it last.  Will update my review if the same problem from previous cable occurs

Honestly I wish apple made there charging cable like this. This charging cable is durable and has not ripped apart on me yet and it’s been over half a year. It charges my phone quite fast and the battery lasts. Worth buying if you go thru charging cables like Crazy
I ordered 3 but only got 2. And i'm super bummed because they were needed for our devices whose cords all quit on us.
This is my second cord. I left my last one behind on a trip to AZ. Great quality for an even greater price! I love the length.. I can interweb from my bed.

My phone battery actually dies WHILE IT'S PLUGGED IN! It took over 8 HOURS to charge my phone... and i started at almost 20% battery... AND IT DIDN'T EVEN FULLY CHARGE! This is a piece of crap. I have a lot of Amazon Basics chargers and they've all worked fine, until now.
Love these braided cords for durability, but especially the length for ease of use, & my own choice of color to distinguish it from 4 other ppl in my house.

Had this since about Christmas (~3 weeks ago as of this review); it no longer works. There appears to be no damage to the cord, but no iOS devices will charge with it anymore, regardless of the base being used.

I haven't had it long but the cord itself as well as the ends seem very durable and strong unlike the apple brand chargers. Hoping this lasts a while before it starts splitting and wires start breaking!
This cord is well made and works perfectly.  My old cord did not work when it was plugged into my PC, but this one charges nicely.
Love how long the cord to charge my phone. It’s a pretty pink color and charges my phone just as fast as my iPhone charger!

It's great!  I ordered a few of these in the pink and they all work well.  The cord is thick so it is best to keep the cord straight (if twisted, it may move your phone along with it).  I've had it for over a year and it doesn't show any sign of wear.  :)
I have had so many cords split at the connection point. These are reinforced and super durable. Great for plugging my phone in to the car.

Great charger, seems to work as well as the original iPhone charger. I haven’t had it very long, but it feels durable. The pink is actually quite pretty and I like the Velcro wrap if you want to wrap it up nicely for travel. Very happy with it so far.

There's not much more I can say about this charger other than it got the job done. You don't get any of those weird messages like "accessory not supported" or anything. It seems very durable, like it can last a while. I've only had it for a week but I have nothing but good things to say about it.

I now have 2 of these as I keep one in the house and carry one with me on the go. These cables are extremely durable and charge my iPhone 7 perfectly. They also don’t crack like the original cables I received with my phone.
Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn’t. Plugged it in overnight and was disappointed when my phone was not fully charged! Good thing I have the protection plan. Great length though!

So far after several months and hundreds of plugins and unplugging, plus coiling, the cable has preformed very well.  No signs of fraying or tearing at the base of the cables.  Extremely happy so far...
Seriously the BEST iPhone chargers that aren’t the name brand.  The length is perfect and they last a long time.  Definitely the charger to buy
Great product! A bit stiff but I’m not worried it will split like my Anker cord did sparking and stinking like melted rubber!

I love it!! Works perfectly for my needs and it’s excellent quality ! It’s so much longer and more durable then the charger that came with my iPhone! Will buy again but it’s very good quality so I might have it for a while! 😊

I’ve bought three of these in the last 3 months and they’ve all stopped working. The prongs have a burnt look to them. We had these before with no problems, so I’m not sure what’s changed or why these have all been bad...but we won’t be buying any more in the future.
Don’t buy this product. After only 4 months of use, it doesn’t working anymore. I’m really frustrated with this cable, now I have to look for another one from another brand, of course.

I keep the 6 ft one by my bed, its long enough to charge and mess with my phone at the same time as laying in bed turned in either direction. I also got the same charger in the 3 ft and keep that one in my car!

my phone can't function properly while its plugged in. typeing, ttexting, a lot of apps all seem to think when I touch the screen that I'm doing some other function. text fills in the wrong order, its all trippy. I want a replacement

pretty pink color and long enough to have at my nightstand. chargers at normal speed, comparable to apple chargers

Have had this charger for over a year and it’s still going strong! Has not broken... amazing quality.

amazon basics iphone cords are better then what iphone gives you. If you bend an iphone wire the wrong way it will break on you in months. These are more durable, easier to move around, and comes with long options

I like this.  It feels much sturdier than the plastic wrapped variety, and I like that it's reinforced at the joint.  We'll see how I feel about it a couple years down the road.  For now, I just wish I could get this in a 30 pin connection as well as the lightning cable.

This power cord works great. It appears to be well built and strong enough to last a long time. I would buy again. In fact I purchased a second one.
Better than the original one. Works the best! Charges very quickly, durable and nice color (pink). It also arrived super quickly. Highly recommended

It’s a charger, it works, it’s reasonably priced, Im calling that a win. For the price I fully expect to replace it in 3 months but I am okay with that. I use this one in bed so it gets a lot of abuse with me bending it while it’s plugged in. I like the velcro strip to hold it together.

Bought this to use with my iPhone 7plus in February. Worked well although it was a bit tight to get into phone with my case. Stopped making a secure connection and therefore stopped charging by June. I have tried with various outlets, plug adaptors and tried with spouse's phone (later model iPhone) and the issue is the same. Past returm window.  It is usless since it won't keep connection to charge.
I am beyond satisfied with all the AmazonBasics charging equipment. It works so much better than most cords and chargers. Great purchase for the money. Highly recommend.

Mine stopped working on one side, I had to push it in, fiddle with the cable, and flip it around to get it to charge. Shotty product not worth your money. Get a real apple cable instead, it will last you longer than the life of your phone.
This is THE best charging cord I’ve ever had. In fact, I lost mine during a stay at the hospital, and I’m back to order another plus. I honestly think the cord could last forever.

I was so happy to get these at a great deal to find out that they don’t charge my phones. The first one lasted about a month before it stopped charging. The next one we tried lasted about a week. This is a great cord for the price. But you can’t backup to your MacBook with this cord. That is the only down side.

So this review is a bit harsh... however this cable just sucks. The quality looks nice, but after about a month or so I was noticing frequent disconnects to my vehicle. Now it's constantly disconnecting from my vehicle even with the cable looking to be intact. NOT recommended whatsoever.
Best iPhone charger around!!! Don’t buy the knock off  products that don’t last. Buy this amazon cord, you won’t be disappointed :)I’ve replaced all my cables with these amazon cables.

It was great at first but only lasted a month before it began to malfunction. I plug the phone in and it constantly charges/stops/charges/stops etc. Wire isn't frayed or mishandled, so who knows why it just stopped working.

Needed a charging cable that was longer then the standard cord that came with my device. So far this cable is of excellent quality, seems to be durable and although this is not a apple manufactured cable, I have had no problems charging my device. I have never received the “unsupported device” error message.

I'd like to start off with mentioning I have ordered this product more than once. I feel as if these cables are hit or miss when it comes to functioning. Some cables last a few months, and others a few weeks. A few things that stay constant are that they will charge your phone/device, but sometimes the apple product has difficulty picking up the accessory cable and it won't work as well for music. I am fairly good about my cables and will purchase the apple brand cables when I need a new one.

It said there was a month wait for this cable. It arrived as if there was no wait. The cable was a lil' stiff at first but within a few uses it was like any other cable you could buy.I bought this cable for one reason, it's reinforced where it matters.

I bought 4 months ago, I used this cable everyday and all day because I work with my phone and so far so good.Very resistant, strong cord and durable. Works really well with other accessories but the cable has to be connected to the device with the letters of "Amazon" facing up. No big deal, just FYI.
Good quality and finishing. I've never thought that was to short. Nex time I'll buy the 6 ft cord.
After several “i” charger cords self destructed,  this seems to have overcome the fragility that the Apple products have. Maybe Apple should outsource to you!
I am very happy with this product. The length is great for my room where I only have one plug-in across the room. The quality of the cable is good and it charges my phone and other devices quickly.

These things are pure crap neither one worked I opened up to plug them in neither one worked. What a waste of time. Shame on you Amazon Prime for even promoting this crap product. Return and refund please.

I’ve had this cord only a few months. It’s already broken as the cord connection is now intermittent. Sometimes it works and sometimes the charge starts and stops as if there is a short in the wiring or a poor connection. The lightning port is clean and works fine with other chargers so it is definitely the cable. Disappointed by this purchase.

The materials and workenship are excellent and should last well past the usual USB‘s, particular Apples. One minor annoyance is the USB does not fit the charger well and is prone to easily slipping out. Otherwise, great value
What a fantastic, long cord. Too bad it will only sporadically actually charge my iPhone or iPad.  99% doesn’t work. Every now and then it will charge for a few glorious seconds.
These just last longer, take more abuse, and never have had issues with charging. The added length is clutch in the bed!
This was perfect for my iphone 6s.  I love the color and the nylon is very sturdy, might I say even cat proof.  iphone charges quickly.

I have purchased many other brands and types of power cables & this one is the best.  I have not had to replace it yet.  With other cables, the rubber coating wears and exposes the wires where the cable meets the plug in.  Because this cable is not coated and the rubberized stem extends over both ends of the cable, there has not been any wear or exposure.  A must buy!

After losing several cables to hungry cats with something to prove, I thought maybe a nylon cable would be able to hold up to the task--and this one definitely has! The cord is very strong, doesn't tangle, is still flexible, and the 6' is a good length for when you still need to charge your phone but don't quite want to get out of bed just yet. Only complaint is that the braided nylon has enough stiffness that the cord can become twisted at times but this is easily solved by twisting it back. Absolutely no problems with the cable itself being loose or losing connectivity.

I bought this charger about a year ago for my girlfriend and she absolutely loved it then... and now! The braided nylon makes it quite durable and the charging is about the same, if not better than the included charger from Apple. The sleek design and color makes this stand out from the crowd, not to mention the 6ft length that allows you to use it in bed, on the couch, or the airport!

Looks good, but doesn't make a firm connection.  Just wiggling the cord a little bit can cause it to lose its connection, or fall out entirely.  (It's not a case problem—this happens with or without a case.) It's very frustrating to hook up my phone all night only to find that it failed to charge at all.

My intention in getting this was so that it was be long enough for me to move around with. Unfortunately, the charge goes in and out when you move the cord around. So you have to make sure you set it down at the right angel to get it to charge. Pretty disappointed it barely functions.

Great charger. My boyfriends iPhone 8 is super picky (my 10 doesn't seem to be...) but it works for him with no issues. The material is great, super durable. Length is perfect - I cannot stand shorter cords so ordering up has been a life saver. We liked it so much, I ordered a second.
This charger is super long and very durable. It has a piece at the end so the wires won’t fray or break from plugging it into your phone. Super cute too!

Amazing quality, very durable, low cost! Had the charger for over a year now, it has nothing wrong with it. I use it everyday bring it everywhere no fraying or bending. A little more expensive then the normal braided cords you find at the gas station but way better quality and it is resistant so it doesn’t kill you phone battery after 6 months like those cheap ones do. But it’s still much cheaper then brand name normal chargers that fray and bend.

Sooo at first I absolutely loved this charging cord, the length is great and it charged quickly...however it has only been about 5 months I’ve had it and it already stopped charging. Completely not worth the purchase if you have to replace it that often. keep shopping around and DO NOT PURCHASE, unless you want to waste your money.
Pretty color, good length.  I like that it has a different texture so I can tell the difference in the dark.  Works great
Good product. I’ve purchased a few because my kids “borrow” it and it’s gone forever after that. I recommend this charging cable. It hasn’t let us down.

I bought this to replace one that mysteriously went missing over Christmas time. I love that the nylon cord won't crack and expose wires like the one that one of my relatives is likely using now. I also love that despite the fact it is an "off brand" cord the fit is perfect.

this product is way better that the originals cables at apple... it last longer, charges faster, looks cooler, plus you can buy it in colors, for less price, my recommendation, throw away all the apple cables an buy this from now on.

Yes, this cord sucks!  It worked for less than a month with no problems.  Then the cord got touchy, it will charge for 1 minute, then stop charging.  If you wiggle the cord, it will sometimes start charging again.  If I leave my phone to charge all night, it will usually only charge 50%.  Don't waste your money.

Perfect length for laying in bed and scrolling mindlessly through social media when you’re supposed to be doing work. Holds up well over time. I had to buy a new one because I misplaced my first one (or someone stole it out of my bag in class).

If the durability of the chord was as good as the charging capability this would be an awesome product! But I can’t tell you how many times I’ve come across my phone NOT charging because the male/female connection was lost. And we’re talking fractions of a millimeter.

I’m not sure y so many bad reviews!  this charger works just as good as the original apple charger I treat it horribly too lol and it’s still performing like day 1 it’s purchased well over 5months ago. I’m looking to purchase another one so I can keep one on me and one in the house so I’m not constantly messing with the cord.

Got this for my BF who's phone is always dying. The outlet near his side of the bed is really far away, and this was the perfect length to let him charge his phone while comfortably using it in bed. Beyond that, the quality is probably the best you could ask for in a charger, it's sturdy and holds up well to bending and wrapping.
This is so sturdy.  You can’t go wrong with this purchase.  I’m getting one for all the kids next!  These are made for longevity, so they will save you money in the long run.

Works great as a charger but will not allow you to use your phone to play music via USB connection.  The cable is non-apple certified so it will not allow music to be played in apple certified​ devices like your Car's USB connector or home stereo.
This is a shorter cord but I purchased that on purpose since I have it on my desk and it works fine without all this wire covering my desk.

Throw $10 in the trash and save yourself the time spent tracking the package. Plugged it into my phone, as soon as I received it, and nothing... Got a new iPhone 6 and it “clicks” in place and charges quickly. Really like the 6 foot cable. I’ve only had three foot cables in the past. I will update again on the durability after I’ve used it for a couple months. My apologies to Amazon.
I am so done with chargers lasting a few weeks or maybe months and then not working. This is the most durable and cost effective I have found. Really pleased with it.
It gets the job done. I thought it would charge my phone faster because bc it says lightning in the name. But it’s alright. I have no complaints. The color is exactly as it’s advertised.

Works for the most part but I constantly have to keep unplugging and replugging it back in to get it to work - if you so much as pick up your phone or put it down while its plugged in, you will have to unplug and plug back in.Wouldnt recommend.

2nd set of cables I have purchased, keep one upstairs and one downstairs. Original Apple cables tend to come apart at the connector. These have thick rubber at both ends. They do the same job as the Apple cable but these seem indestructible! I’ve had my first set for over a year with no sighs of wear. Amazon cables are the only way to go. Plus, they are less money, easy to buy and show up at my door in 2 days.

This is the best charger cord I’ve ever purchased, and I will only use this brand from now on. I use my phone regularly, and I’ve gone through at least 50 charger cords, but this one has to be the longest lasting one. I bought this in May 2017 and it’s STILL WORKING! I am amazed, I don’t think I’ve ever had a charger last this long for me. I literally used this every single day since the day it came in the mail and I’ve never had any problems with it. Highly recommend!
Charged slowly/poorly at first, and after a couple months has stopped working entirely. At this point ineligible for a return—would advise on a different, more reliable brand than Amazon’s own.

Then this is for you! I hated buying new cords every few months and was looking for a good and durable charging cord that can handle my constant plugging and unplugging of my phone. This cable is sturdy and I don't imagine it tearing apart anytime soon. Plus, the price was extremely affordable and way better than buying a brand new charging cord that's twice the price and half the length.

NOT compatible with Apple Car Play. It only charges my battery but does not allow synching with any of my devices even thought the description specifically states "complete charge and sync compatibility with your Apple device".  LIES!!!!
I bought this cable for my daughter. Its durable and has outlasted other cables that I bought for cheaper. I am delightfully surprised.
It’s really good quality. So far it’s still working great. Only thing is not really fast charge with my fast charges.

These cables ought to be excellent. They appear durable and connect securely. For whatever reason, however, they fail to actually contact the elements inside the phone which receive the connection. This gets worse over time, and at this point the cable in my car is not functional (which led me here to buy a new lightning cable, and I am reviewing this real quick before I do so).I strongly recommend against buying these, as I've used two and they both failed in the same manner along the same timeline.

Good news, the cable works...but bad news, it charges EXTREMELY slowly. The material is very durable and looks great, but the actual charging capabilities are not good. Would not recommend. You are better off purchasing a whole new Apple cable
After two years iPhone displays “this accessory may not be supported” error message. Can not connect with customer support due to item being 2 yrs old
Sometimes it still has trouble with holding the connection to my phone so I have to jiggle the cable but works 95% of the time.
Doesn’t charge as fast as a name brand cable, but does charge. More sturdy than name brand. Length is as advertised.

Works great! I usually have to buy chargers frequently because well I take them everywhere and people use them and just they get all bent out of shape! Plus the chord is long enough so I’m not trying to reach my short arms behind the bed to grab it’

These lighting cords are durable and do not sign of damage. After couple of months of using it stopped charging the phone. Contacted Amazon and they issued refund. I hope Amazon can stand behind their products and instead of issuing a refund should replace the product if it becomes defective.

So much sturdier than what comes with the iPhone. It’s longer and very strong appearing. I always find that the Apple product always wears out quickly and is not made to last. I think this will last longer and the cost is very reasonable.

I received two of these charging cables. The first one bent when I put it in my phone so I got a replacement...which lasted a month and then starting sucking the power OUT of my phone. The opposite of what it is supposed to do. Very disappointed in this cable...amazon basic doesn’t normally let me down like this.

I would give it no stars if I could. You might read the reviews and decide "eh, they're not too bad, let's buy these cords." Don't. They're awful. My son used his and the end broke off in the iPad on the first use! So I told him to use the second one. Same thing!!!!! Returning these asap. Won't buy them again. Not sure how they're able to sell them.

I purchased this as a replacement charger cord for my phone charger after our new puppy ate it.  This cord works great and I love the additional length!  Now hopefully we can keep the dog away from it! lol

Bought this for use in my jeep on the go. Figured it was worth upgrading to the higher quality "braided" version since it'll be in and out of a glove box. So far it's holding up well. Charges mine and my wife's iphones and iPad with no issue. Will update if any issues arise.If this review helped, please let me know by clicking 'yes' at the bottom of the review!

Arrived quickly and is just as expected - nice gold color goes well with my gold phone stand. I love having a 6 foot cable and using the extra flexibility to be able to charge wherever I want on my desk. Would definitely get again.

My biggest problem with the original Apple brand iphone charger is that the end of the chargers always fray/break.  This solves that issue and I llove these nylon braided charges so much better than the original ones provided by apple.
Some cords will DAMAGE your battery and this one is basically like buying a new apple charger! Highly suggest it to save your phone and pocket, plus it’s durable, long and cute!
Very happy with it. It seems the charging cables of Amazon basic has been dramatically improved.

I bought this cable after my Apple cable started splitting at the ends of the cable part. That’s no concern with this cable at all. It’s super durable, high quality, great length, bendable, and chic. Love it.
I love this cord.  It will outlast my phone.  And I like the extended length.  It’s long enough to reach most outlets when you’re sitting in a chair close by.

I loved this cord -- I would consider this a splurge on a charger cord considering I could get a 3-pack for the same price or a single cord at any of the discount stores for half the price but I thought amazon basics would be a reliable, solid choice compared to what's out there -- plus it came with a wrapping velcro strip which was a bonus.That being said,t he cord died and just stopped working 1.5 months after I started using it. I bought this cord in mid-August and it is not the end of September and it does not work with ANY of my devices anymore and I even tried on my friends phones and different outlets but alas, it is a dead cord. Very disappointing.
Very durable, use them for both iPhones and iPad. Love the length. This my 2nd set of 2 so both my husband and I have 2 long cords.
Not only is the cord good looking, it's actually very sturdy and long.  I will purchase again!
Well made cables and quality connectors at both ends. Helps charge very fast. Highly recommended
This cord broke within 6 weeks, just past the 30 day return time. I bought it to replace a much older one. The quality has deteriorated a lot.

Great product, was hesitant to buy a cord that wasn’t made by apple because of what I had heard from others. But this cord has been great. It’s lasted for a very long time now and the length is great. Well worth it.
Have had this for awhile and it works great ! No breaking at the end like normal appleChargers . Great length gives you room to have it plugged in and able to be on your phone at the same time
Worked for 18 days after it arrived.  Quit a few minutes ago while using it to charge my iPad.  Just to make sure it was the cable I switched cables and the other cable works ok.

These are great. I keep one in my bedroom, another in my office, and two in my car. It makes sharing the charging cable in the car super easy. It also lets everyone be DJ off of one person's phone while it's charging. Love it.
Loved this cord at first but now that I’ve had it for a couple month it’s breaking like the others I have used. Sadly disappointed with this product
The cord is way too long. Weak, cheap cord would be a good description. It still works and charges my phone. I’d use a different cord for sound.

Well, it seemed to work fine for over a year. But then it just stopped (or rather became intermittent) working.I cleaned the connections, did some debugging by plugging it into different charging cubes and phones. Definitely the cable. But, perhaps that is a reasonable life (but as another noted, my old ratty Appled cable that is taped up with electrical tape etc., STILL works). Just sayin.....

Cord is built to last but after a few uses the gold plated pads on the end of the charger broke off. I partially blame my kid but the other cords I have don't have this issue...and they use them also.
My girl was able to break the cord after getting into an argument with me. If a skinny girl like her can break it, than its not worth your time.
Only lasted maybe a little over 3 months. The cord itself is durable but the plug wore out very quickly and wouldn’t charge my iPhone or iPad. Probably would not buy again
Just ordered our second one, so now we have 2. The cord is the perfect length for outlets out of normal cord size reach. Had the first about a year now and it’s working still. Recommend for sure

It seemed a good idea to get this cable for the car to connect/charge my phone or my wife's or my kid's phones from the charger connected  in the car and I was right, used many, many, many times already and still intact as to wear and tear.

These are absolutely great cables for charging iPhone and iPad Mini. They seem sturdier than the other cables. Plus, they're pretty and they come with a thin Velcro strap to keep them wound up nice and neatly in a drawer. Very happy with these cables.
My cord stopped working about a month after i got it. At the time it was my only charger. I loved the long cord though was perfect at my job!
Es de muy buena calidad, carga super bien todos los aparatos complatibles y en el mismo tiempo que el cable original.

Still fairly new so still evaluating longevity.  However the connectors at either end have some additional silicon on them to protect where the cord meets the connection which is a common failure point as these types of cords tend to get a lot of pressure there which then cause the cord to fail.  These seem to be a better design.
The only cable I will ever buy for my iphone anymore!Very trusted and dependable! Will last for a long time unlike most other chargers!

I have bought three of the Amazon Basics Nylon braided 3 feet cable. The first one I bought was the silver one back in December after my Apple lightning cable broke. I used to take it with me everywhere: charge my phone st my home, car, at work, my friend’s house, and one trip I took between the time. Then in February I decided to buy two more a rose gold and dark grey one. I have one for my house, one for my car and one that I take with me for back up. So far I’ve had no problem with any of the three I have.

So Happy. I've been purchasing nylon braided chargers since last year, and have broken 3 from other brands (the part where it charges) by dropping the plugged phone from my BED. This one doesn't break, although I've dropped my iPad with the charger plugged in.

4 teenagers with iPhones is asking to replace cables like nobody’s business. You buy the cheap one because they are cheap, but those just break every couple weeks so you are going through them like PEZ candies from an Amazon shaped dispenser. Eventually you try these because maybe paying a little more will get you better quality and it works. Somehow these survive both the mishandling of daily teenage life and the couch monsters that seem to randomly consume other cables. The integrated zip ties are a nice touch for someone like me who likes to keep cables neatly bundled.
This was on my granddaughter's Christmas list. I bought them, she likes them. We are both happy.

I got this because I was tired of not being able to use my phone if I was sitting on the couch or laying in bed and having to lay awkwardly to keep my phone plugged into the standard charging cord. SUPER durable and flexible and the perfect length. The rose gold is a cute color as well. Highly recommend!

I’ve had this charger for a little while now, and have experienced no problem whatsoever with them. They work as a normal iPhone charger should, and have worked better when I need to import photos to my PC than my original iPhone chargers have. The color is also pretty nice!

I ordered this on May 6th and it completely stopped working last night, June 3rd. So only about a month of use. There is nothing physically wrong with it that I can see yet it doesn’t charge at all. The last iPhone charger I had(different brand) lasted years. I’m very disappointed in this product.
I have bought other braided cords and they died within a month or two.  They weren't damaged or anything just stopped working  Not this one!!  This is a couple years old and still going strong!!
Have had this cord for 2 years still going strong. My wife is a stay at home mom that works off of her phone and was going through cords weekly. Purchased this and can relax once again
After a year of use, my cord stopped working and I replaced it with this one. This “second edition” by Amazon is a much better product. It charges faster and the braided cord feels strong and tight.

I have to get a new one of these every six months, but it just seems to be the norm with these cables. Also, when it's plugged into my phone, it makes Touch ID not work. Otherwise works fine for a while, and length is great for couch/bed etc.
Great product bought one for the whole family after the initial “try one and see” very durable still working and the cat hasn’t been able to kill it yet :)

I loved the length, but my phone, which never has a problem with battery life, drained quickly after using this. Went back to using my original charging cord, and the battery life on my phone is back to normal. Scared to use it on my iPad.

THIS PRODUCT STARTED SMOKING IN MY CAR. DO NOT BUY .  Yesterday, I was with my friends. I go inside and leave them in the car. When I return, I smell something burnt and they tell me they had to unplug the charger very quickly so the car wouldn't catch fire. “It started letting out a little smoke out of the wire”.  I cant imagine what would've happened if they hadn't seen it start smoking.
Item as described.
This product does the same job as a standard Apple iPhone charger. I haven’t had any issues with the product and am very happy with my purchase.

“Amazons choice” when searching for “iPhone 8 aux cable”... The fact that it is a USB is seriously annoying. Obviously it is my fault for not reading everything in detail but This purchase was made in a hurry. Usually Amazon is spot on with descriptions but the inconvienece of having to return the item at a Ups store 25 minutes away is disheartening to say the least.

I used this product to charge an iPhone 6.  I bought four with three of those used daily.  The connections became more and more intermittent until they didn't work at all.  I cleaned the contacts with rubbing alcohol which helped for a few days but eventually, they wouldn't work at all.  As an approved Apple service provider, the GeekSquad cleaned the phone's receptacle two months ago at no charge.
Had this for a year. Worked well until about a year as the connector to the phone became loose, causing it not to charge the phone even if it's "plugged" in.
After awhile it said “this device is not compatiabke”
Have had over a month and still working well.  No wear on cord yet as most do.  Keeping my fingers crossed.Would recommend.  Ordering another now to replace the poor one I got In Feb
The rose gold color is very nice, the phone cord does not have a lot of give, but just received it so waiting to see how it holds up
Very durable and far superior to the non-nylon coated version. I will be buying another!
This is my first braided cord and I love it! Works great for my iPhone 8 Plus! I would recommend and buy this product again!
These cables will charge your device much faster than the standard lightning cable supplied by Apple.
All my cords, especially from Apple kept breaking. I was tired, this one has been durable and is extremely solid. I highly recommend it.  Plus it is also quite long.

The cable looks high quality, and worked fine for about 4 weeks.  Then, the phone started pulsing on and off constantly when plugged in.  The problem doesn't happen with other cables.  What is it with aftermarket Apple cables.  It's almost like Apple senses you're using a non-OEM cable and zaps it.

I’ve had this charger for a whole year now and it’s doing great! It charges my phone quickly even while I’m still using it and holds up agains my cats sharp teeth (she loves to chew on cords so I needed something a bit protected) also the length makes it awesome when living in a dorm and sleeping on a lofted bed!!

Amazing product! I've had to buy a lot of replacement chargers for my iPhone but this one has held up the longest. It's sturdy, does not get heat up, works perfectly. This is my second purchase but only because I needed one for home and one for the car! 10/10 would recommend :)

I kept breaking the original chargers that came with my iPhone & so after replacing them with knockoff version of the same kind, I decided to instead try the nylon usb cables.So far so good! I am happy with my purchase.
Using this cable every day, no issues at all. Love the nylon and the extra support it has at the connector ends. I feel like most cables break there, but Amazon made these cables to last
Works great. Used it to Charge my phone from a power brick. I only wish it was a tiny bit longer but otherwise its great.

These cables are pretty awesome. I use mine daily, and they are extremely durable. I also like that they are longer than the regular Apple cables. Definitely recommend AmazonBasics and this product in particular.
I keep this by my recliner in the living room. Never had a problem. It has held up very well and charges great. I would buy again.
Ordered this on the 23rd of September and it has already stopped working as of February 2020. Get a different one.
These cords are long lasting and strong. They don’t break at the base and stop working. They usually last me about 2 years before needing to be replace and that’s with pretty rigorous use and travel.
So far so good, unlike some of the cheap knockoff cords for sale on here. I’ve bought quite a few cheap ones and they all fail. Not these.
Best charger ever! Better than apple brand. Durable and charges fast. I’m pretty rough with chargers and this one beats all the others.

I bought this USB charger because I needed one that was long so that I wouldn't have to sit next to the wall when my phone was charging. I love the length and the material. My phone chargers rather quickly as well. I would definitely recommend this product.
I have been very pleased with this cord. Its color helps me find it so I don’t confuse it as easily with other cords.

I bought this for the length. Tired of fighting the short leash. Decided to get 'tough' also. The braid is bulkier and the ends are much more substantial. I hope that the overall design will prove to be worth the cost. So far, I really like what I see. I'll have to update on the wear factor after some use. Right now I would buy them again. I bought 2, one for the phone and one for the iPad.
I adore this thing. The rose gold color is beautiful. I’ve had it for a few months and it looks and acts brand new still. No way to tell the longevity just yet but I would say it’s well worth it.

Nice cord so far. It has a thicker end that plugs into the phone that doesn't fit too good into my phone covers port charging hole (Lifeproof)  It's a nice thick, braided cord though that works good without the cover.8/21/2017 One cord doesn't work anymore. So it lasted just over 4 months. The other one still works just fine
This stopped working within a month and a half of use - I won't be be buying this again.
It’s long it’s flexible it’s durable it’s one of the best charging cords I have ever had for a small price

We've definitely enjoyed the braided cord. My son moves the charger around a lot and it weakens and doesn't stay in the end of the iPad to charge. When we bought the braided cord, it has lasted us way longer than the others and still going strong!

It's not as fragile as an apple cord (and I've gone through more than I can count), not as expensive, and comes in a longer length - what's not to love?  This cord was highly recommended to me, but I was pretty skeptical that it would be as good as I was told.  Skeptic no more - it's even better than recommended!
Best cord I’ve ever owned. Bought first one three years ago, and has no signs of fraying. Just added several more to the collection.

While charging my phone overnight, this charge became so hot that when I went to unplug it my hand was burned. After grabbing a towel, I unplugged the cable and metal USB-C connection separated from the cable. I then realized it was so hot that it had melted the exterior of my phone and fuzed it's self to the back of my Nexus 5X. No longer chargeable, I was forced to purchase a new phone. Would not recommend.
Works.  It is for a work phone which is the only Apple thing I have, so can't really provide a comparison with other Apple stuff.
This is a really nice lightning cable. The flexibility of the braid is very useful. I leave it hooked up in my car 24/7 and it hasn't has any issues in the months that I've been using it.
Likes: The color, durability, charges quicker than my last charger.Dislikes: The cord is a bit short.

Every one of the AmazonBasics cables I've purchased (this USB-to-Lightning cable, an RCA subwoofer cable, and several HDMI) has been extremely high quality, especially for such a low price.  Unless I need something unique they don't make, I will likely limit my cable purchases to just AmazonBasics versions from now on.
Perfect length for all my needs. Quality of the cord is great. Will definitely need to get more of these for around the house.
Went a little over the top and grabbed 10 pack. Have them all over the house now. I love that they come with the Velcro cable tie.

Similar to other nylon cord chargers this product stopped working 5 weeks after I purchased it. The part connecting the charger to the cord seemed to disconnect which prevented the charger from working. It would sporadically charge my phone if placed at the perfect angle and held in place or not charge it at all. The color was nice and it looks as advertised but it's just not worth it for a charger that was effectively useless after 5 weeks, I expected better from an amazon basics product.
This product has actually held up longer than expected. It works great and the length is just what I needed.
Third time purchasing this item because i keep using them all over my house and office. Really great length and works as described.
So far it works.  All of the charge cords I buy to charge my iPhone 6s stop working after awhile.  So annoying!  This is one is working for now.
Arrived on time, charges well.  Got it to replace cable from another brand, which had suddenly become unreliable after a relatively short lifetime.  Hoping for better luck on durability this time.
I’ve read so many bad reviews on this product which made me hesitant to buy . The price of it made me take a chance and I’m glad I did. We now have 2 in our home and they work great!
This cord seems super durable and I love the length/ sturdiness of it. It gets a little stiff when it gets twisted, but that doesn’t affect the quality of it.

Longer is better. And the braided is much more plieable (sp) than the vinyl kind. Time will tell as to the durability. Nice having the length when charging and useing the device. Fits in the OTTER BOX case for I phone 5 and 5

I have an 11yr old - she blows through charging coords relatively easy, usually causing a short because of too much bending near the plug. This coord seems to be quite durable, no signs of wearing down yet.
I have had this product for a long time now. I was very impressed by how long it has lasted! Very strong and durable.
Loved the size, the length, the heft...it just stopped working less than 8 months after buying it. Too bad. I sprung $21.50 for an Apple product that cost a bit more but is guaranteed.
One of three did not work right out of the box.  They don't seem to connect as well as the Apple OEM cables to the phone.  Can't beat the Apple cables.  Still have not found any that perform as well.
Lasted a really long time, but stopped working well after a few months.  Just what you'd expect from a cheap charger honestly
i’ve had this for maybe 1 year, works great and hasn’t broke, which is rare with iphone chargers.

This cable is really good quality. materials and performance are superb. The main feature of this cable really supports data transfer! checked !!! I bought the first one in August and after a while I bought some more children in the car.
This cord works pretty well and is the perfect length for having on my nightstand
Excellent! I was tired of buying them from apple and having them split and break. It also charges my ipad and iphone a lot faster. Love that it was available in colors. I got pink.

Best cord I’ve ever had!  Bought different colored ones for whole family.  My husband normally buys cheap cords.  I don’t think we’ll ever go back to cheap flimsy cords again.  Spend an extra few bucks, it’s worth it!
I’ve been using the chord for the past few months and works really well. It’s good quality.  The pink color is same as the pictured and I’ll buy again to replace my original Apple chords.
I really like how sturdy this cord is. I carry it with me and don't worry about it getting crimped or tangled. The extra length comes in handy, too.

Strong braided cable that looks even stronger and much more durable than the original Apple Lightning cable. It syncs to the computers and car just fine! I do plan to purchase more of these cables to replace all my original Apple Lightning cables.
I’ve been using it for about a year now and it works perfectly I totally recommend it. Buy it without a doubt.

Booo. Stopped charging juuuuuust after the Amazon return window expired. It now gives us the dreaded “This device may not be supported” message. I really wish there was a reliable company who could make a durable iPhone charger that DOESN’T cost an arm and a leg.
This charger works great, and I love the fabric cord casing - it really helps with durability and tangling. It would be cool if it were a little longer, but it does its job.
We were sick of being tied down when we needed to charge our tablets.  These are nice and long, as well as strong.  Can’t tell how long they will last, we haven’t had them long enough.

Cables and cords can be very over-priced. The original Apple Lightning cord became frayed near the connector that's why I wanted to try a braided cable. Have only been using it for a few weeks but it seems to be very well made and is flexible.

Ive bought these many times. This one cord my iphone says accessory not supported and wont charge with.How does this only happen with some cords, amazon? I buy these bc the cheaper cords always have this issue. If this happens with yours i will have to go back to buying the apple official

It surely feels like it will hold up. Only time will tell. Maybe I should have given it to my teenage son for a REAL torture test! At any rate, if it fails in any way within a year, I'll update. It stays in my car so it will be exposed to temperature changes, uv rays, and non-ventilated flatulence.A year has passed and no update is necessary.

This charging cable lasted about 2 months. I think a charging cable should last a lot longer. I look for a different cable that lasts longer. I bought this cable instead of the Apple cable because it looks like it is made with sturdy material, but it is not.
The cables worked good for about eight months. Then it started flaking out and wouldn’t charge. Did seem to last longer than apples. Also had them replaced through amazon with no issues.

I'm glad I purchased -- cord is a diff color than any others in the house, so I KNOW which one is mine! Nice quality and a good length. I like the grey, b/c it doesn't look dirty like the white cords do. Would buy again.

I love this product especially the length of the cord. At the beginning the charging power was quick but now after a couple of months it has slowed down. It’s still very good and made by again if price is right.

Writing this review after a year of using this cable and i have had no issue with it. I ordered rose gold 6 foot cable. The cable has a velcro which is nice to keep the cable wrapped and hence tidy when taking the cable in a bag.

This product is very good and is made of good material.  Lasts long and it appears it will last even longer.  My only issue is that it is losing its "grip" per say, where if I turn my phone sideways while charging it the plug comes loose.

I literally bought this exactly one month ago and my cord is already not working. And I know it’s the cord because I plugged in other cords and other charging plugs etc and it was 100% the cord. Very disappointed considering it had such good reviews. I loved the length of it but sadly it stopped working all together after 30 days. And trying to return it get a refund is nearly impossible it seems like.

We love how long these are because our plugs are so far from the bed. They are durable and have let to break like the original ones do. So far apple hasn't given us any popups about using a cord that isn't theirs.

These charging cables don't last long. I was constantly having to angle the charger and turn it over so it would actually charge. One wrong tug and the charging part breaks off. I had one that lasted a few months, but others only lasted a few days before snapping.
Was good for the first two months.. now the connection becomes unstable. Only holding it steady when plugged in works fine.

So far this cord works great. No iPhone error charging messages seems to be nice and sturdy fits perfect with my iPhone SE Lifeproof Fre case (there is a red skin sticker on the case in the picture). Nice purchase for a good price will update if I have any issues later with the cord.

Love this cord.  The last one I bought lasted me 3 years. Then I needed a new one and ordered it again. Love the color and length. I can sit on my couch and charge it or lay in bed both while using my phone.
These are great. This is the 3rd one I've bought. Nothing has gone wrong with any of them. I just wanted spares.
Loved the color! It was a good charger, I had it for a while and then it broke out of nowhere though. I think I had it for a couple years or so.

Bought several of these in different sizes and colors. They last! Always had issues with iPhone cords fraying and exposing wires. These are 10 times better and have had no issues with compatibility even though it’s not an apple product.

Over the years, I have bought numerous apple brand iPhone power cords. They all broke rather quickly from standard wear and tear. So I decided to change things up and go with a different brand. And let me say that I could not be happier.  I have had the amazon cord in my car for some time now and it has shown no signs of wearing out. It is reinforced and as durable as can be. (Plus it's apple certified) This is the last iPhone power cord you will ever need to buy.
Wasn't expecting it to be as short as it was compared to the 10ft Amazon Charger.

The charger is intact, however it does not do its job which is to charge my phone. When it plugged in it shows that its “charging” however the battery does not increase, and when it does increase it is after hours of being plugged in and only goes up a very little bit. Very annoying having to deal with this issue. I have never had problems with amazon chargers in the past.
Buyer Beware... of Buying Broken Braided USBArrived broken.
Horrible. This is the second cord I have had. The first one stopped charging after 2 weeks. This one lasted 2 months. I would not buy again!

I have owned this for about 2 months. But for the past 3 weeks it well only charge for a few minutes, then stop. I have to keep unplugging my charger and plugging it back in. Buy a different brand. Waste of 10$
The best, longest lasting phone cord I have ever used. This is my second one I’ve purchased but the first one lasted longer than any I’ve ever had before. Several years.

The cord keeps slipping out of my phone. Very annoying as I have to regularly check it to make sure it’s charging and that it didn’t slip out and not charge. There have been one or two nights where it didn’t charge because it slipped out. The lesson here is don’t buy a product just because Amazon chose this as their recommended option. Read the reviews and then proceed to check out.
These cords are so well made that we now have 3 of them in our house. These last forever and resist fraying and wear, which is great since we use these all the time. I love the length of them too.

This is great. It's a nice long cord, definitely better than the plastic stuff that comes with my apple product (always somehow manages to tear). This little dude has been strong and no signs of wear after a month. It's just great. I'd recommend it to everyone with apple products. Sturdy stuff.

I tend to burn through my iPhone chargers relatively quickly.  The end where it plugs into the phone always gets frayed and my charging power diminishes greatly and that’s a huge problemI am in real estate and both in my car and on the phone often  if I don’t have my phone plugged in, my client does. So, having a reliable charger is important.

This charger lasted about 3 months and then stopped charging. This is the 2nd charger I've purchased from Amazon Basics and they both only lasted a few months before they stopped working. The cord itself is durable in that it didn't fray or come apart at the end, but the actual functional capacity for these chargers is minimal. Disappointed that Amazon would put out such a terrible product.

I bought these to replace cables that wore out from heavy use to connect my iPhone 6 to a backup battery. These cables appear very robust, and so far have shown no signs of wear in spite of being abused by being used while my iPhone was connected to my back up battery that was being carried around in my pocket or fanny pack. So far they appear to be high quality robust cables at a bargain price.

love how flexible this is and how convenient it is to pack and travel with. Bought this as a replacement for an apple cord that had frayed from one too many coils and all the travel I do. This is a perfect solution and I am so happy with it.
This cable works great, although the braided material came damaged on delivery.

Not real happy with the higher price.  I was loooking at others at the same price per PAIR, so I was suprised to receive just one at more money..  Gotta be careful with the stuff they refer you to while you're looking at something.  My bad?  Partially, but why are these so much more for one?
I received this cord the end of April and it has already stopped charging my phone. Not a wise choice in charging cords. Buyer beware.
My apple charger was cracked and I bought this replacement. The cord is braided and should last longer. It has a handy Velcro for storage or to make it shorter. Love ❤️ it.

Worked fine for a while before the power connection on the lightning tip started getting finicky. The contacts wore to the point that it doesn't always make a connection. Various of the standard style cables have lasted more than 3x as long with no problems.

This lightning cable lasted two months and then became non functional.  It appears the white (ceramic?) piece that separates the phone power contacts is cracked.  I could figure no way to get my $$ back, so ordered another brand.  Disappointing.

The product itself seemed to work perfectly for the last 3 months. I've had no issue with it at all and have used it interchangeably with another charging cord. However, one day it completely stopped charging the phone. I tried to plug it into different charging boxes to see if the box was the issue, but sadly it was not. I was hoping I wouldn't have to purchase another charging cord so soon since this one was rated so highly on Amazon.

I will never buy another Apple cord again. This thing is the real deal. After buying countless apple brand cords every month-1.5 months, I finally invested in this baby in March. Not only is this half the price, It has lasted me SO much longer than any cord I've ever had. I mean, this cord has been working without fail for over 4 months. I even got my mother and brother to hop on the bandwagon. Great product, and should I ever need to, I will certainly purchase again!

This cable line it was working fine. I felt it was hard, so it made me feel broken inside and shorter than I thought.After I used it a dozen times, there was a time when I couldn't charge it.I hope this line will last for a long time!
I love these!!!  I will be buying more for family & for work.  These have been the best I’ve ever bought & I’m tough on cords.
Trying to figure out how to set the time to turn off the timer at, say, 11:00 PM is very frustrating.  Setting the timer on is not so bad, but figuring out how to turn it off was the problem.

I bought this charger in March of 2019 & it is JUST starting to short. It tore around April of 2020 but still hadn’t shorted out until a few days ago. I would say I’m extremely durable (I’m rough on chargers & electronics) & lasts long. Would definitely recommend. I’m ordering another one today.
This lasts longer than the cables from Apple, which tend to crack and expose the wiring fairly quickly. It also matches my gold iPhone nicely, so what is there not to love, really?
These are doing really well. I bought the pink due to a few dollars cheaper but other than my husband not being super happy they are perfect.

So far so good. Got the cord today in the mail. My biggest concern was my iPhone giving me the message of the cord not being recognized because it's non-Apple, but it's working perfectly. You can tell the cord is very strong because of the braided design. The part I like the most is the strong rubber part on the end of the cord where it plugs into your phone. All of my former apple cords got destroyed in that spot each time. The rubber piece seems sturdy and strong, which I need because I go through cords quickly. Overall perfect product
Durable and does not feel cheap. No issues with my iPhone recognizing the non Apple cord. Charges just fine.
I absolutely love this product.  I bought both in silver and rose.  The length is very good.  It has a velcro tie for easy storage, it is wired so you can fold it nicely.  Couldn't be happier :)
Loved the length and worked like any regular lightning charger does. It won’t take the abuse. Chargers have been getting abused here at my house lately and this one sadly didn’t stand up to it.
Lools good, works good and hopefully will last longer than the Apple OEM cord.
This cord has lasted longer than many of the other ones I’ve ordered before. 10/10 would buy again

I bought this for use in the car. Its very durable and the audio quality is perfect. Very good deal for the price. I will buy again but this cord has lasted so long I don't think I'll need another one soon.

Two reasons to give this a 5 star. #1, if you've bought charging cords in the past, you know that they will eventually fail.  Usually just seconds after the time period when Amazon will accept returns. After that period, you have to contact the manufacturer directly.  Good luck with that. For about $10, it's not worth the hassle of tracking them down and emailing receipts, etc. My Amazon cord failed a couple months in. No problem. Since they're the manufacturer (at least by name), they took it back in the same way that they take back other returns. Print the label, send, get credit.Reason #2, the little Velcro wrap. It ties around the cord to keep it from unraveling when not in use.  It's just the right size, easy to use, and makes my OCD life happy. I would even buy these little strips separately (are you listening Amazon?).
